reviews.title: Very worth it for the tech you’re getting
reviews.body: Gore Tex parts of shoe is very good at keeping water out. I stayed true to size because of the gTx layer inside. Very comfortable and feet don’t get sweaty due to the tech. All this for less than regular AF1? Ez cop haha

reviews.title: Real nice crep
reviews.body: Bought for my man and he looks peng. Says the fit is right round the feet and they’re true to size.

reviews.title: Great winter shoe
reviews.body: Love the GTX on these, they have survive Colorado snow multiple times! My second pair, perfect winter shoe, the GTX boot is also great if you need something more sturdy.

reviews.title: AMAZING
reviews.body: A BIT HARD INITIALLY BUT GREAT TO MOVE AROUND.VERY COMFORTABLE AND NO FEAR OF FALL ON SLIPPERY SURFACES.I SPENT LAST WINTER WEARING IT DAY AND NIGHT.THE MORE YOU WEAR I, IT BECOMES MORE COMFORTABLE.ABSOLUTELY WATERPROOF. LOVE THEM.

Shoes are tighter than originals only at first, I opened them up and could not put them on due to the different materials. I took off the laces and relaxed them looser and now they fit perfectly. True to size and they are really comfortable. Excellent deal!!

reviews.title: Total Satisfaction
reviews.body: I purchased these shoes for my grandson for his birthday. He is a skateboarder and really likes these shoes. They are comfortable and attractive. The shipping was fast and the website was easy to use. I would certainly recommend this company.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.body: Fast delivery was able to change address to new home

reviews.title: Nice AF1 with Gore-Tex
reviews.body: Good shoes , classic AF1 with Gore-tex added . Works good when it’s raining or some sort of any water outside. These are less wide than original AF1 , because of the different construction of the shoe . I love durability and old classical stile with modern technology.

reviews.title: These shoes are not made for a human foot
reviews.body: I bought these to have more casual shoes but was shocked upon receiving these. Just look down at these, the heel is as wide (maybe wider) than the toe box. Feet are not shaped like these. Can't believe anyone would want these.

reviews.title: Quality Shoe
reviews.body: I just ordered my third pair of Gore-Tex Air Force 1's.  I have found them to be fashionable, rugged and comfortable.  The only criticism I would have is that when they first launched, they came in way more (and more interesting) colors.  The colors that are still in production are all rather bland.  I would love to see them re-released in more colors.

reviews.title: Durable shoe, stylish but not comfortable
reviews.body: Sneaker is very durable but not made for the wider foot. The tongue is attached to the Sneaker so it doesn't give you the opportunity to loosen the strings to adjust width to give a more room for comfort

reviews.title: Legit best shoes I've ever owned
reviews.body: Living in the PNW I had been looking for a stylish yet water/winter proof shoe to kick around in. I've worn these for work, going out (when that was a thing) and yard chores. They are literally bullet proof. I've since ordered additional pairs. They handle the rain and cold well and honestly can barely tell how often I've worn these over the last year. They still look almost brand new. And I've worn them almost part of each day.

reviews.title: Very well snkrs especially for rainy days
reviews.body: I love my snkrs for rain

reviews.title: Was overall happy with the shoe
reviews.body: Was purchased for a Christmas gift. Shoe checked all boxes.

reviews.title: Attention, la paire est plus grise que noire
reviews.body: Très déçu de mon achat. Je pensais que la paire serait noire comme sur les photos sur site cependant elles sont plutôt grises anthracite ce qui n'est absolument pas visible sur les visuels.

reviews.title: Great durable waterproof stylish sneaker
reviews.body: Love the Air Force 1 collection. I love having waterproof Air Force 1's even more. Great winter, or really any season, sneaker. Can trust that you won't get caught out with bad conditions, waterproof to the max. Your feet will stay dry. The sneaker is also a very durable and rugged design, basic materials. Rubber outsole, encapsulated air unit to be protected from the sharp objects on the ground. Leather upper with Goretex fabric lining. This shoe will last a long time.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.body: Amazing looking trainers. Great for winter walks, feet kept dry and warm. Best Nike purchase in a ehile

reviews.title: Very comfortable, great water protection , love the colour scheme..
reviews.body: Would defiantly recommend this pair of air force one..

The shoes are a gift for my son but they look sharp, I can’t wait for him to open them he’s been after a pair of AirForce 1’s for a while and these Gore-tex pair are ‘sick’ as he would say.... I can’t wait till Xmas and if he doesn’t like them he’s now my sizes... hahahahaha

reviews.title: Style and Color
reviews.body: Looking to get a brown sneaker for awhile. When I saw this one, had to have it. Very, very please with my purchase on this sneaker.

reviews.title: I still like the shoe,  I always been a  Goretex fan
reviews.body: The color was a little bit different from the picture, the picture makes it look like the shoe strings and the  Vinyl are burgundy a little, they are  Actually all brown, and the tongue is  Attached to the shoe a little bit too tight for me, because I have wide feet, they didn't go with the outfit that I  Purchase them for, I will just have to buy a brown outfit to go with them, and hopefully in time the tongue stretch out a little bit,  I still like the shoe

reviews.title: Almost the perfect shoe.
reviews.body: The overall product is great and deserves a higher rating. The dark brown works well on this model and the durability is plus. However, Nike needs to check their QC, literally. My pair had what appeared to be a misplaced check sign which was removed and resown. That’s just inexcusable.

title: Nike Court Vision Mid
description: In love with the classic look of retro basketball but have a thing for the fast-paced culture of today's game?Meet the Nike Court Vision Mid.Its textured upper and stitched overlays are inspired by the hook-shot look of old-school b-ball.A plush, mid-height collar keeps it sleek and comfortable.

title: Nike Air VaporMax 2021 FK
description: Made from at least 40% recycled materials by weight, the Nike Air VaporMax 2021 FK is airy and easy to wear with super-stretchy, recycled Flyknit fabric, plus a soft collar that sculpts your ankle.The stitched-on Swoosh and recycled TPU heel clip add a splash of intrigue as you float down the streets on incredibly soft VaporMax cushioning.

The shoes are amazing but, it’s the durability that makes the shoe not 5/5. I had these shoes for 5 weeks and they wore out if the durability was better I would have no doubt

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.body: My son has used these for 3 months only (and only limited to tennis practices) and there are holes in the upper. It’s a pricey shoe to have holes so soon. It is a good looking shoe though I wouldn’t recommend for frequent tennis players.

reviews.title: A Phenomenal Tennis Shoe...
reviews.body: Innovation and incredible design make this a superior tennis shoe with amazing cosmetics as well..  Love the new lacing system which helps this shoe fit like a glove. Lots of cushion along with a snug fit around the foot make it great for a hard court surface. Plenty of room in the toe area and a secure feeing in the hee

title: Nike Air Max 90
description: Nothing as fly, nothing as comfortable, nothing as proven—the Nike Air Max 90 stays true to its roots with the iconic Waffle sole, stitched overlays and classic TPU accents.Fresh materials update the design while Max Air cushioning adds comfort to your journey.

title: Nike Air Max 96 II
description: Bringing back the sporty aesthetic imagined by a famed Nike designer, the Nike Air Max 96 II remake is a wardrobe essential.With winter colours on top of a classic '90s construction, it pairs sophisticated style with fast-paced, athletics-inspired details.Its large Nike Air unit keeps the perfect amount of casual while adding lasting comfort.

title: Nike Air Max 97
description: With the iconic ripple design that was inspired by Japanese bullet trains, the Nike Air Max 97 lets you push your style full speed ahead.Taking the revolutionary full-length Nike Air unit that shook up the running world and adding fresh materials, it lets you ride in comfort.

title: Nike Air Pegasus 83 Premium
description: Just lace up and arrive looking fresh.With a splash of running history, a dash of retro style and a whole lot of comfort, the Nike Air Pegasus 83 Premium is your go-to staple.Era-echoing suedes and durable textile keep it easy to wear.Plush padding and crisp leather around the ankle keep it feeling like your favourite armchair.

title: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 Shield
description: Wet weather can't stop your daily running habit when you lace up your workhorse with wings.We set out to keep your feet both warm and dry in damp conditions, so we added details like a gusseted, insulated tongue and a warm upper that's finished with a weatherised coating.Tyre-inspired grip creates tough traction to help keep you moving on slick streets.

title: Nike Air Force 1 '07 Craft
description: The legend lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07 Craft—a modern take on the iconic AF-1 with new details like fresh graphics on the tongue and heel. Crisp leather, brushed suede and exposed stitching on the upper add texture and depth while the new plush liner feels soft and comfortable. Its redesigned shape returns to OG roots, adding heritage style.

reviews.title: MUST HAVES!!

reviews.title: Best pair of AF1 I’ve ever purchased

I do have to mention though, I ordered these in m

reviews.title: AF1 FOREVER!
reviews.body: I have been wearing AF1's for over 25 years in almost every color & will never stop wearing them. They have been the most comfortable, most assorted colored sneaker i have come across... AF1 FOREVER!

reviews.title: A Classic Elevated
reviews.body: A classic staple elevated with great quality work for a more luxurious look. Definitely worth the "Craft" label Nike placed on these AF-1s. The minimalist branding allows them to be dressed up to add a touch of casual flair.
Very happy with this premium edition of the classic Air Force 1.  Super butter soft leather!

reviews.title: These are the best pair of white on white AF1’s period!
reviews.body: These are the best pair of AF1’s I've ever purchased and i’ve been collecting shoes since 1987. The extra $30 are well worth it. Beautiful soft buttery leather, even the cushion is way better compared to regular pair. Go true to size on these. More cushion & better leather so they don’t run big like the regular AF1’s.

Needless to say, this pair did not disappoint, but there are still a few quirks that I would like resolved.Firstly, this pair is probably one of the best quality AF1s I’ve had in hand. reviews.title: Fire fit and quality.
reviews.body: These are essentially the nicest Nikes I own and I have Shattered Backboard Jordan 1s, Lance Mountains etc.,some other quality Nikes and JB releases.  These are just a notch above.  They do seem to run a little tighter than other AF 1s but would still go 1/2 size down.

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.body: Anytime Nike remasters an AF1 in an OG color way with premium leather, sign me up! They run true to air force sizing which for me is always .5 down from my regular size. These are A+ A little chunkier than the AF1 07 but I'll take it. Make more color ways Nike!

title: Nike React Miler 2 Shield
description: Don't let the rain stop your daily running routine.We took the classic look of your favourite runner and added a warm upper with a weatherised coating.Our goal was to keep your feet dry in damp conditions, so we added details like a gusseted and insulated tongue.And with a supportive design built for maximum shock absorption, each step feels stable.Tough, tyre-inspired traction creates grip to help keep you moving on slick streets.

title: Nike Air Max Impact 3
description: Influence the game at both ends of the court in the Nike Air Max Impact 3.Ideal for players who create separation with their vertical, it features pressure-tested Max Air cushioning to help absorb impact.Plus, rubber wraps up the sides for added durability and stability.

title: Jordan Stay Loyal
description: Straight from our past and into the future.The Jordan Stay Loyal takes cues from the classic Air Jordan 12 to create a shoe that's fresh yet familiar.Inspired by the 12's durability, it features burly leather overlays and rubber herringbone traction that wraps up the toe, sides and heel.

title: Jordan MA2
description: Shatter the sneaker status quo in the Jordan MA2. Made from a mix of suede, full-grain leather and a variety of textiles, it's got unconventional labels, technical micro-graphics and raw foam edges for a balance of new and classic. Easy to get on and off, it looks good with just about anything.

title: Nike SB Shane Premium
description: The Nike SB Shane Premium performs like the original but looks like it walked right off the beaten path.The classic blend of suede and canvas is finished with a felted collar and rope laces that nod to vintage hiking footwear.

title: Nike Air Max Impact 3
description: Influence the game at both ends of the court in the Nike Air Max Impact 3.Ideal for players who create separation with their vertical, it features pressure-tested Max Air cushioning to help absorb impact.Plus, rubber wraps up the sides for added durability and stability.

title: Nike Precision 5
description: A quick first step makes all the difference. The Nike Precision 5 locks in your foot with structured materials and cushions with resilient foam. Stripped down and sculpted, the shape allows quick cuts and hard banks when you're angling for an advantage.

I loved ❤️

reviews.title: They are a good shoes
reviews.body: In my case my foot is flat and wide triple e's so this shoe I ordered in 14 which is my size, but I recommend order one size above if you have the same issues. Other than that you cannot beat the price and quality.

reviews.title: Falls short
reviews.body: This line of shoe is known to give you good performance shoes for a low price. Out of all the precision shoes this one is the worst. Very comfortable shoe with above average impact protection, good ankle support however the traction of the shoe is poor. I find myself slipping ok both clean and dusty courts. Comfortable shoe but doesn’t provide the performance I want. Buy the other precision shoes instead.

reviews.title: Great shoes!
reviews.body: Great shoes!

reviews.title: Unexpectedly great
reviews.body: I love these shoes. After playing in signature models for years I finally tried a markdown and MAN let me tell you. They're lighter and even more comfortable than others and still provide a very nice, running-shoe-like cushion that has good bounce. Overall, try these if you like low tops or want something minimal.

reviews.title: Too tight
reviews.body: I really liked how the precision 4 fit my feet. These precision 5s have become more narrow and the arch is too high for my comfort.

title: Nike Metcon 7 AMP
description: Tougher and more stable than previous versions, meet the gold standard for weight training.We've added React foam that ups the comfort to keep you ready for high-intensity cardio.Plus, a tab locks down your laces so you can forget about them coming untied when you're focused on your next PR.

title: Nike Air Force 1 Mid '07
description: The Air Force 1 Mid '07 is everything you know best: crisp overlays, fresh accents and the perfect details to let your shoe game shine.The padded, mid-height collar with a classic hook-and-loop closure adds heritage b-ball comfort.Nike Air cushioning in the heel delivers performance comfort.

title: Air Jordan 1 Low
description: When a classic shoe meets greatness, you get the Air Jordan 1 Low, your new favourite, inspired by the 1985 original.Its features are highlighted with a soft brown colour and gum outsole, delivering a clean look and low-cut silhouette that's perfect for casual wear.

title: Nike Air Zoom G.T.Run
description: Feel fresh.Hustle hard.The Nike Air Zoom G.T.Run is designed for players who can do it all on court and need their shoes to keep up.Its cushioning system is stacked with 2 Zoom Air units plus 2 layers of Nike React foam.Ultralight and extra supportive in key areas, it provides a snug, consistent fit and a responsive feel to help you get the most out of your energy and outlast the competition.

reviews.title: Support without sacrificing style
reviews.body: My husband put these on and was pleasantly surprised. He commented immediately about how comfortable and light they were. After extended use he mentioned he felt the sole was a little chunky and the lace up was a little snug. But overall he is a fan. Lots of good ankl
love the look, not super supportive in the body of the shoe. the sole is super squishy but the rest of the shoe feels very thin, not for me. they run a little bit big  as well.

No detail was missed, not even the laces. This shoe has soft padding in all the right places as well as a durable mesh construction that wil

reviews.title: Nice look, but Not Comfy
reviews.body: When first opening this box, these shoes look spectacular. The colors are bright and would catch anyone’s eye. I had high hopes when putting them on. They fit well, true to size and the sole is comfortable. However, the tongue of the shoe is made out of some sort of rough material. No matter how I try to situate it, this part feels scratchy and pokes my foot, even through s

reviews.title: Love the Color and Design
reviews.body: I got the red pair of these and I really like the color and style of these shoes. They are more of a summer type shoe with the mesh on the sides which helps keep your feet a bit cooler. They look really unique especially with the paint splatter on the bottom.  Unfortunately the size seems to run small and narrow. The way the sides are attached inside makes putting the

reviews.title: Look nice but tight fit
reviews.body: These sneakers look really nice and stylish. The design is great. The major issue is that they are very narrow. If these weren’t so narrow, they’d be a comfortable shoe to wear all day. Maybe they will break in better over time. The thing I like most about this sneaker is the color scheme and the thick soles.

reviews.title: Shoes look sweet, the comfort just got me
reviews.body: Nike has really stepped it up with the Nike Air GT Run Basketball shoes. I took these out of the box and was so impressed with the look, weight, and construction of the shoes.I managed to get the red white and blue ones and loved the way they looked. The tongue and body is made of a mesh material that makes this one of the lightest basketball shoes I've owned an

reviews.title: Nike Air GT Run Basketball Shoe
reviews.body: These running shoes are very impressive. Loved the red with white and blue accents. Lightweight for long runs but ample padding to protect your feet. Breathable for those hot days. They did run on the very narrow side however.

reviews.title: Flashy but comfortable
reviews.body: These shoes are extremely comfortable and have a very flexible fit. While the red color may be for some, it was a bit flashy. Overall, the shoe is made well, has great support, and fits like a glove.

reviews.title: Eye Catching and Light
reviews.body: Nike Air GT Run Basketball shoes are gorgeous and eye-catching. The red, white, and blue design makes you imagine you're on the Dream Team. My husband appreciated the appearance. They are a little bright for his taste, but absolutely has appeal. Most of the comments were about fit. These shoes are ex

reviews.title: Love the Red, white, and blue
reviews.body: Although my husband hasn’t played basketball in some time, he still loves the look of a good basketball shoe for his everyday wearing. We both really like the look of these shoes and really love the nod to the good ol’ USA! The shoes feel comfortable overall but are a little stiff in the sole. He feels this will loosen up more as he wears them in. The high top offers good ankle support and has plenty of padding. The fabric of the shoe is very breathable which is a plus.

reviews.title: Very narrow but cool looking
reviews.body: I really would like to give these shoes a 5 star rating because when I opened the box, I thought they looked so cool.  I always wear a size 12 in athletic shoes, but these were so narrow, I was hardly able to get them on my feet.  Overall, the shoes feel like they would be very comfortable if they fit right, but they fit so tight that I'm unable to wear them.  Overall, the red is a really good color and they seem like they're made well.

reviews.title: Awesome shoes!!
reviews.body: My husband loves these shoes! He’s had many days to try them now and they are very comfortable (and stay comfy throughout the day!). They are light weight but sturdy with great quality. The fit is perfect, and the look is awesome! The style of this shoe is on point. My hubby feels great in these!

reviews.title: Best Shoes
reviews.body: I love these shoes. Not only do they look great, but they hug your feet in all the right places. They have great bounce and even better support. The tongue doesn’t dig in and molds to the top of your feet. The tab on the back makes them easy to get on and off. The padding in the rear cups your heels perfectly. They are also just a great looking shoe. My 19 year old saw them and wants a pair. These are now my go-to basketball shoes.

reviews.title: Lightweight basketball shoes
reviews.body: These shoes are very comfortable and allow you to move around easier on the basketball court.  The lightweight design helps to run faster and react quicker.  They work well for basketball, running, or just wearing around all day, too.  The materials are durable and the footbed cushioning provides great support. The tongue for the shoe doesn't have any cushion, but doesn't effect the overall comfort too much.  It works best to wear thicker, taller socks with these shoes though.  The red is a nice bold color and I like the navy and white accents.  Didn't take long to break in.  Looking forward to seeing how these shoes continue to hold up.  I would recommend these to anyone looking for new lightweight versatile basketball shoes.

reviews.title: Light breezy sneakers.
reviews.body: The colors of the sneakers are great. Very bright and patriotic. They do say USA on the pull tab of the shoe. These sneakers fit just right according to size. They are comfortable. Good for everyday wear or for exercising in. It is nice that they are a mesh like side so they letting good air flow in so your feet do not overheat. Overall I am very impressed with the quality and the design!

reviews.title: Tier 1 basketball shoe
reviews.body: This basketball shoe is amazing! Its the perfect mix of comfort and stability. The shoe looks amazing as well and has the dopest designs on it. The shoe sole is so comfy and snug. This is one of the best all around basketball shoes I have ever worn!!

reviews.title: Excellent cushioning

reviews.title: GREAT

reviews.title: Killer hooping shoe or work shoe...I wish they would have put some kind of material on the react insole
REAL DEAL REVIEW!! Replace the insole!
reviews.body: This shoe is the second iteration of the Nike zoom BB. Everything that was wrong with the zoom BB (Heavy, narrow and pinching, stiff upper material) Nike has corrected with this shoe. The upper is comfortable, the zoom strobel in the forefoot is phenomenal… And the REACT foam is very cushiony. The insole is LAME…it makes your sock stick to it when putting the shoe on…. And makes the ride less plush and not as enjoyable. SO…I have replaced the stock insole with a SPENCO insole and this has opened up the heavens!! The second day of walking around and teaching hoops in this shoe out on the asphalt has been a joy. Then when I got them on the hardwood during the third day I was in cloud 9! I’m 6’6” 240lbs. Love this shoe!!

title: Nike Asuna Crater

The ultra-plush strap is made from a mixture including some recycled materials, while the unique lacing system with toggle offers a quick, customised fit that lets you transition effortlessly between worlds.

I like the s mall hint of pink in the check, although I would have like it if they also did the air bubble in the sam

These are real close (although I wish the Manchester's were released in the US) - got the Venom green & Desert colorways. The outsole is much thicker than your normal AM90 & rubber mids perfect for wet & cold conditions. Overall great quality shoe & simple aesthetic. Waiting for the US release for the blacks & venoms.

title: Nike Downshifter 11
description: The Nike Downshifter 11 gives you lightweight, flexible support to keep you going.It continues the same soft cushioning from the last version, and adds more support around the midfoot, to make it comfortable to wear long after your workout.

reviews.title: Great running shoe for the price

Very comfy shoe. Just exactly what I was looking for when I ordered it. I will recommend this shoe.

reviews.title: Definitely recommend this shoe!
reviews.body: Love these! Have had them for 3 weeks and have run in them several times with no complaints. Very lightweight and comfortable, great traction. I am using them as cross country shoes, so some road and some trail running, and they seem to do well in both settings. As well as great functionality, I got them in the black and white color scheme, and they look great with anything, very stylish and versatile. Only sh

The tennis shoes are very comfortable and look great for running or casual dressing.

Great shoes stylish comfortable good for gym running and casual got a half size up from what I normally wear fits great even though I have big feet the regular sizing is fine extra wide is unnecessary so go with the regular size unless your fit are extremely wide

title: Nike Blazer Low X
description: Praised by the streets for classic simplicity and comfort, the must-have wardrobe staple just got elevated.A plush, 3/4-length foam wedge in the midsole cushions every step.Its tongue feels smooth against your foot and fresh branding re-energises the sleek, low-top design that has withstood the test of trends.Meet the new Blazer Low X.

reviews.title: Simple et efficace
reviews.body: Je désirais un modele sobre mais avec un petit truc en plus. Ces Blazer sont parfaites. Cuir souple, confort immédiat, une alternative parfaite au modèle phare de la marque aux 3 bandes... je ne l'ai quitte plus.

title: Nike Air Max Plus
description: Let your attitude have the edge in your Nike Air Max Plus, a "Tuned" Air experience that offers premium stability and unbelievable cushioning.Featuring airy mesh, a digitised print and fresh colour pops, it celebrates your defiant style.

title: Nike Metcon 7 X
description: The Nike Metcon 7 X is the gold standard for weight training—even tougher and more stable than previous versions. We've also added React foam that ups the comfort to keep you ready for high-intensity cardio. Plus, a tab locks down your laces so you can forget about them coming untied when you're focused on your next PR.

reviews.title: They’re okay. Metcon 6 is a higher performing shoe.
reviews.body: Aesthetically pleasing but it feels like a backslide in performance relative to the 6. And the lace lock thing is a good idea but feels kinda gimmicky in execution.

reviews.title: Decent shoe but would not purchase again
reviews.body: Over all review a decent shoe if you are looking for something stylish and cardio based performance.

reviews.title: Awesome look and functional
reviews.body: Two things.  Functional (they work for lifting) and they look awesome!
So great, they feel indestructible. They hug my feet so well, definitely a better fit than the 6 (which I still loved). Would highly recommend.

title: Nike Metcon 7 By You
description: The Nike Metcon 7 By You shines the spotlight on teamwork with a brand-new colour palette and details that are inspired by a band of battle-hardened warriors.This design is the gold standard for weight training—even tougher and more stable than previous versions.React foam ups the comfort to keep you ready for high-intensity cardio.Plus, a tab locks down your laces, so you can forget about them coming untied when you're focused on helping your partner beat their PB.

title: Nike Air Zoom Pulse
description: Built for and tested by nurses, the Nike Air Zoom Pulse combines cushioning and flexible traction for a comfortable, natural feel that lasts through long shifts on dry and slippery surfaces.The durable design is easy to clean, pull on and take off to keep you ready for the unexpected.

reviews.title: Dreadful
reviews.body: I will start with the positives. They are broad for wide feet and waterproof. The negatives, so uncomfortable. First day wearing them my heels ended up blistered and bleeding. Tried thick socks, same thing. They rub non stop. They are also too flat and offer little support for someone on their feet for 12 hours. I am a nurse definitely wouldn’t recommend them and

reviews.title: Terrible quality
reviews.body: I bought these for my wife who is a nurse and with in a month of wearing them they fell apart. She loved the feel but unfortunately they just did hold up.

reviews.title: Great for a couple months
reviews.body: I am an ER RN, I had wanted these shoes for years and when I finally saw them on the Nike site I was super excited! These do run a little small so size up, width is great as I have super wide feet. I had tons of compliments and they are very comfortable, but my heal did slide a lot, meaning that I wore out the back of them within two months. Otherwise, they are easy to wipe down and stay clean. I also fou

reviews.title: Horrible Shoes
reviews.body: If I could give these shoes zero stars I would. Nike advertises that these shoes are good for health care workers but not even half way into my shifts these shoes were killing me. I have never wanted to take shoes off faster in my life. I also got horrible blisters from them since the back digs into my heel and slides up and down. I tried regular and double socks, nothing helped. I really wanted to

reviews.title: Need 2 size bigger and be worn for a few days just to be comfortable.
reviews.body: 1st buy was my exact foot size - and it hurt the back of my ankles bad. I expected it to get loose and get more comfortable as I wear it but it didnt, so I returned it and purcahsed 2 size bigger, and its okay now.I work in the hospital and used to wear hospital shoes so I expected this kind of shoe to be comfortable, soft, an

reviews.title: Mitigé
reviews.body: Étant actuellement élève aide soignante je n'ai utilisé ces chaussures que pour 4 stages de 4 semaines chacun, le confort est présent mais je ne suis pas convaincue de leur durabilité...j'ai l'impression qu'elles sont déjà en train de céder au niveau du dessus à l'avant du pied. Je ne sais pas si je vais renouveler l'expérience avec ces chaussures qui soit dit en passant n'ont pas un beau design du tout.

reviews.title: Top pratique
reviews.body: 4 mois d'utilisation en environnement hospitalier et de rééducation, franchement que du bonheur et elles font des jaloux.ses ! Très pratique et facile à enfiler avec ou sans le talon arrière. Facile d'entretien, un coup d'éponge ou de machine à laver et elle sont comme neuves. Grosse semelle intérieure pour le confort, elles sont hyper confortables et pratique et je les utilise désormais dans la vie de tous les jours avec plaisir.

reviews.title: Definitely not slip resistant
reviews.body: I purchased these for my job as a busy barista/supervisor because I am on my feet and in an environment where the floors are constantly wet. Today was my first full day wearing them and I nearly fell due to the lack of traction. I was really looking forward to these shoes being “the ones”, as I have tried 4 other brands and none compared to these in both style and comfo

I bought the size 9 and it’s like a flip flop in the back 🤦🏾‍♀️I thought buying them bigger would be a little more comfortable but nope they bother me and I keep wear them to figure out how to love them like my other pair . reviews.title: SO UNCOMFORTABLE!
reviews.body: Made for healthcare workers??? These shoes are SUPER uncomfortable and keep digging into my ankles no matter how much I try to stretch them. I wore them for 12+ hours and by the end of the day my feet were aching.

reviews.title: Some good qualities but definite room for improvement
reviews.body: I have been wearing these shoes for 3 months now. First off, I have big, wide feet. I wear a 14. If you have wide feet, they are not going to work. They are extremely narrow, and without a wide option, I found my feet to be wider, by a large margin, than the actual sole. My feet hang over on the ball of my foot at least a half inch over the actual sole. This isn’t at all comfortable or supportive. It tends to make my ankle want to roll. Second, the elastic band the holds the shoe on at the heel wears out fast, causing the shoe to slip off the heel with every step. It only held its own, maybe a month. I am a psych nurse and was running down the hall to assist a staff member in an emergency situation and one of the shoes flew off my foot. Just in general walking, willfully having to adjust your gait so the shoe won’t slip off is a pretty big issue.

I was so excited to get these shoes but they will not stay on my feet. The backs constantly slip up and down on my ankles and makes them impossible to wear. I don’t think it’s a fit issue, just the way they are designed. It’s very disappointing.

reviews.title: Think the white ones would be better than the black
reviews.body: I am returning theses trainers as I don’t like them a nuisance as I always order Nike trainers but will have to return them

reviews.title: The perfect health care worker shoe
reviews.body: Bought for my wife who's a Dental surgeon. These are absolutely brilliant and she's not stopped talking about them.

reviews.title: nurses shoe
reviews.body: Really comfortable but runs big so got wrong size

reviews.title: Only last 2 months and start wearing off
reviews.body: First wear is very impression, a pair of good nursing shoes. After wearing for 2 months and start wearing off especially inside the heel area and the dorsal area. Disappointed with the material i&o and the value.

reviews.title: On your feet all day, look no further.
reviews.body: I never leave reviews, so listen up….

reviews.title: A Bit Snug
reviews.body: I've been wearing them for the past week and I can vouch how comfortable they are after a 8-12hr day.  My slight concern is how snug they initially feel on you feet.  By the end of the day (after your feet swell a little) they tend to feel a bit tight.  I recommend getting them a 1/2 - 1 size bigger than you normally wear.  My other personal preference are more neutral colors, but this is just nitpicking.  I've read other reviews regarding the wear-and-tear of the heel portion of the shoe, which I haven't experience yet, therefore this review may be updated in the near future.

reviews.title: Thankfully a bit wider.
reviews.body: These are very comfortable and cute (I got the grey pair). They are a bit wider than my other Nike shoes which I love. I got compliments the first time I wore them. :D
Super confortables. Légères et imperméables.

reviews.title: Do not recommend
reviews.body: Loved the shoes at first but only had 5 months use out of them. The inside of the heels ripped and the plastic inside was poking me. I would not recommend these shoes.

reviews.title: Very Disappointed and Discouraged.
reviews.body: I waited soooo long for these shoes after they sold out instantly. I’ve always worn nikes as my shoe of choice at the hospital so I was pumped when they went into a medical shoe!

reviews.title: inside back of heel
reviews.body: My husband bought these shoes for me as we are both nurses. I have worn my shoes less than twenty times and the inside where the back of the heel hits have broken open and hard pieces jab my foot. Very disappointed as I told people to buy these after first week of wearing them at work. I wouldn't say the same now as they are broken open and have caused a blister on the back of my right foot already.

reviews.title: Awesome shoe! Well worth the money.
reviews.body: I did not get this shoe for myself. Saw the shoe online and bought it for someone in the medical field. They love it! Said it’s the most comfortable shoe they’ve worn in the hospital. This is actually the second pair purchased because she loved it so much and unfortunately Nike tends to run out of items fast. She actually wanted the all white ones but they were sold out in her size.

reviews.title: Extremely comfortable!!
reviews.body: Most comfortable shoe I have ever had on my feet!!

reviews.title: Respiratory therapist
reviews.body: So far so good on comfortability for a 12 hour work shift

reviews.title: Spot on.
reviews.body: Got these for my girlfriend because she is works in the medical field.  She really enjoys them and find them very comfortable.

reviews.title: Not worth the money
reviews.body: Love the design, they are comfortable and very easy to clean. However I bought these less than 2 months ago and they are ripping apart on both shoes, for a shoe made for medical workers that are on there feet all day they are not durable at all. They are expensive and I would not recommend to anyone.

reviews.title: So Lit
reviews.body: Working 8 hrs straight in clinic on my feet. I wanted something fly and comfortable love the unique style and the appropriate taste to the medical field. The no slip grip could use a litter more work, but other than that great product. I love Nike wear. Please make more Nurses/ Medical assistant attire and shoes.

reviews.title: CO COMFY! 6+ hrs of pain-free wear at my on-your-feet job.
reviews.body: These are so comfy!!!!!

reviews.title: Runs large.
reviews.body: These run extremely large and the heel is very loose. I normally wear a 5.5 or 6 in Nike. The 5.5 was way too big. Returning.

reviews.title: Amazing foot ware
reviews.body: Love these shoes!!

reviews.title: Nike has their finger on the Pulse
reviews.body: A comfortable convertible that can be worn for urgent activity or every day events. Fluid wipes off easily and the shoes still looks good! A great venture into health care footwear

reviews.title: Left disappointed
reviews.body: I had been looking for these since there where announced in 2019, I finally managed to get a pair in the UK and I'm so disappointed  I bought them in Feb. and the heels have completely disintegrated, the heel needs to be sturdy in nursing I find the slip on to loose and in emergencies they have flown off( I'm in cardiology so can happen frequently) I have had to go back to my old shoes because these are no longer wearable.

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.body: I really like these shoes! My back pain is gone, even working long days on my feet. My only problem is after about 6 months the heel has started to give way and is digging into my ankle.

reviews.title: Runs a little small
reviews.body: Great shoe but runs about a half size too small. I would even go up a full size if I decide to get another pair.

I really liked these shoes at first. I have only had these for 6 months and like other reviews the inside of the heel is wore out down to the plastic. I would not recommend buying these if you were wanting to get more than 6 months of wear out of them.

reviews.title: Not good after 2 months of wearing.
reviews.body: A good shoe for healthcare workers. I dislike the shoe because after about 2 months of wearing the inside by the heel is worn out and has split open.

reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
reviews.body: I had I hopes for these. I always wear Nike.  These are awful though.  Very uncomfortable.  Make my feet sweat like crazy.  Definitely don’t recommend.

reviews.title: Best nursing shoes!
reviews.body: These shoes are great for being on your feet for 12 hours. I never had feet, or back pain with these and they feel like you are waking on a pillow!

reviews.title: Comfortable, but they don't hold up
reviews.body: Shoes are awesome and comfortable, but I have worn holes in the inside of the shoe by my heels in a little over 2 months of wearing them.

I started using these back in November 2020 and I loved them! Easy to get on and off, easy to clean. Super comfy! Which is a must as I am a nurse working 12 hour shifts. The only thing keeping me from giving this 5 stars is the quality. Only going on six months of use, and the inside heel portion is already wearing down and has some holes. The harder inner material is starting to rub against my socks and wear them down as well. The outer material, although easy to clean, is also starting to get some cracks. These are still my go to work shoes, but because of these issues I've had to alternate footwear.

reviews.title: Not for all day wear
reviews.body: I work in healthcare and am on my feet a lot. I average 12-13K steps a day. This shoe is extremely comfortable when you first put it on. The sole is very flexible and it feels almost like you're walking with heavily padded socks on. I think that's what hurts this shoe the most. By the afternoon my feet hurt and I feel like I've been walking on the hard hospital floors barefoot. They also have no arch support at all. I don't have high arches by any means, and that's not normally a problem I notice. They do stay on very well with the elastic strap, unlike traditional clogs, and the splash resistance has saved my feet a couple times already. I would only recommend these to someone who generally stays in one area at work and does not have to walk around the hospital most of the day. I regret the purchase as I don't think I'll be able to tolerate them to get enough life out of them.

reviews.title: Wore them for two weeks- ripped on top and adhesive from bottom sole separating.
reviews.body: When i wore these for the first week i was in so much love- they are incredibly comfortable, and very easy to clean. i’ve had them just 3 weeks and they are ripped and the adhesive of the side connecting the sole is already separating! i’m so disappointed as i’ve been a nike girl for YEARs and ignored the reviews in hopes to have a different outcome, but unfortunately not.

I love the way these feel on my feet. I broke my foot two years in a row. The same foot. It never healed right. It hurts when it’s cold or wet out. Throbs. So I have to look for a comfortable shoe especially for that. This shoe is it. I’ve never been comfortable at work. I’m a CNA and on my feet for 12-16 hours. The only thing I have to say is I don’t like the way they look. I wish there were more color options. I got black because that would match most my scrubs. I would have loved an option to buy the emoji original one but I can’t find those anywhere. I’ve had these for a few months now and they look brand new! They’re easy to slip on my feet if I’m in a hurry. They are amazing in showers! No water has seeped in like it has in other shoes! I am telling you! I am in love with these shoes! I wish I could have a multicolored bright colors one I could wear with any color scrubs I wore. Maybe they’ll come back out with new versions?! Please?!! Lol I love Nike!!! It’s all I wear!!

reviews.title: Poor quality
reviews.body: I bought two pairs to alternate wearing. Even alternating it took two months for one of them to start cracking on the top of the foot and the foot bed wore down within a month. Not made for medical workers that are walking and standing.

reviews.title: Disappointed :(
reviews.body: I wanted to love these, but unfortunately after two months of wearing them for my 12 hour shifts, the top portion of the shoe has cracks and splits in it. I’m disappointed because I expected them to be more durable for the healthcare setting. I would recommend them for comfort, but not for their sustainability.

title: NikeCourt Air Zoom Vapor Pro
description: The NikeCourt Air Zoom Vapor Pro takes everything you love about the NikeCourt Air Zoom Vapor X and makes it lighter and more supportive. The 3-layer design puts breathability, stability and durability where they're needed most, all while keeping weight at a minimum.

reviews.title: Look great!  Not comfortable for me.
reviews.body: The toe-box is much more narrow than it appears b/c the outside soles protrude past the upper a good bit.  They look great though!

Was looking for a lighter shoe amd was worried I wouldn’t be able to find something lighter the the vapor x.  This show does the trick. It’s also been holding up nicely as well.  Def recommend. Order half size down though. Runs big

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.body: Very good shoe

reviews.title: a Great court Shoe
reviews.body: The show is true to size.  It is very comfortable to wear and  gives great support for slow and fast starts on the court.  It is a comfortable light weight shoe. I would definitely rec it to anyone active on the tennis court.

reviews.title: Toe Box too Small
reviews.body: Got these to replace the Vapor X.  Not the same fit.  The toe box is smashed in especially on the big toe side.  Nike normally smashes you on the little toe side but this just did not toe binding just did not work to play tennis in.  They look really nice though.

reviews.title: Great Addition to Vapor line
reviews.body: The vapor pro is the newest shoe in the vapor line of tennis shoes and it retains the characteristics that define Vapors.  The shoe is light, speedy, very low to the ground.  People looking for speed shoes will enjoy this, however if you are looking for cushioning, this won't be the shoe for you.  Really liking the design of the Vapor Pros.  Also liking the price.

reviews.title: GREAT IMPROVEMENT ON X BUT RUNS 1/2 size big
reviews.body: Love the feel of this one for tennis. My movement was crisp and explosive. lighter and more fun than the x. BUT it runs half size big. i usually wear 11.5 and 11 fits good. so just buy a half size down and you should be ok.

reviews.title: Runs HUGE
reviews.body: Took a very long time to arrive and they run HUGE. Always a tight 10 in Nike and these are 1 maybe even 2 sizes too big. Very odd.

reviews.title: bien mais pas autant que les zoom vapor 9 et 9.5
reviews.body: confortables même neuves (contrairement aux zoom vapor X). Pli sur la chaussure droite lors de la flexion qui provoque une petite gêne (ne se produit pas avec la chaussure gauche, donc couture non constante?). Toujours pas aussi confortables que les zoom vapor 9 et 9.5 (réédition possible si on est assez nombreux?)

title: Nike Air Presto
description: With a sleek design that's more comfortable than your favourite T-shirt, the Nike Air Presto is made to feel good and look fast. Its stretchy sleeve creates a cosy, sock-like fit while the super-soft foam adds spring to your step.Put them on and you'll never want to take them off.

reviews.body: They are nice looking shoes but they seem to fit a half a size smaller the neck collar

reviews.title: Prestro
reviews.body: Quick and fast delivery. Very comfortable shoe. Would recommend them

reviews.title: T Shirt for your feet...indeed!
reviews.body: I didn't have them back in 2000's but they are very, very comfortable and hold up well over the years.  The fit is snug but allows for freedom of movement without feeling restrictive.  It feels like an evolution from the Huarache line which is a great thing.  Highly recommended.

reviews.title: air presto blanche

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.body: I bought it for my Son who in year 6 he absolutely loved.
Super comfy and fit good, only complaint is how ugly they are

reviews.title: So comfy
reviews.body: Bought these for my husband and he loves them now have them in most colours!
Great shoe

reviews.title: Foot Spa for Runners!
reviews.body: I am a runner and I need super comfortable shoes to walk in after a long run. These prestos right here are the real deal for my tired feet and post run blisters. Shoe is comfy, breathable, easy to put on and lightweight. Its my favorite shoe to sit on a plane or drive out of state. It has a pleasant bounce and could potentially be converted into a running shoe which I personally will not run in them. Great Job Nike!

reviews.title: Good shoes
reviews.body: I bought this one for my son and he’s very pleased!

reviews.title: Comfy
reviews.body: Need breaking in as tight to start with but comfortable once worn a few times

reviews.title: My air presto
reviews.body: I love them

reviews.title: Prestos Rule OK
reviews.body: Present for father, who loves them.
Excelente

reviews.title: Great, comfortable everyday shoe
reviews.body: Man I have to say I love these shoes.  They are so comfortable and great for all summer outfits.

reviews.title: Zero Durability; Plastic Sides Rip into Mesh
reviews.body: These shoes are pretty comfortable, but for some reason there is zero friction on the insides, causing you to slip and slide within the shoe (no matter what sock you're wearing) and subsequently making them horrible for running or making any quick turns. But most importantly, the plastic side plates have weirdly sharp edges that tear into the mesh of the shoe after even minimal wear -- I've barely had my shoes for three months now and the mesh is tearing on the sides (as well as at the front toe). Just super poor quality, not meant for any form of physical activity (even fast walking). And to boot, no one at Nike has responded to my claim for any sort of refund. These shoes are all fashion over function. Don't buy.

reviews.title: Comfy and nice
reviews.body: Nike Presto feels like old days!!!!! Hoping for more colors

reviews.title: Look great!

reviews.title: Presto

reviews.title: Kd 14 review
reviews.body: Can’t lie these shoes are probably the best shoe of 2021. I don’t like KD as a player that much but mike team did their thing with the 14s. I have the lebron 18s and the KDs feel better then those. The zoom and cushlon duo is perfect, feels like your stepping on a cloud but then as your foot releases from each step you feel the zoom immediately propel you. The best way I can describe it is stepping on a memory foam pillow then being propelled by a trampoline on each toe-off. Like I couldn’t care less about the materials, the underfoot is what steals the bacon for this shoe. Traction is great, and upper materials are soft but also do a great job at containing the foot. The strap doesn’t feel like a useless gimmick and doesn’t irritate your foot, even strapped tightly. The top lace did bring some unwanted pressure but just kissing it a little made that issue disappear. So don’t choke the shoe to much in your foot. Other then that this might be the best shoe of 2021 so far.

reviews.title: A hoopers shoe for sure
reviews.body: This is “the shoe”. I struggle with planters foot and weak ankles. My feet cramp often too in most basketball shoes. I can tell you these are responsive and have great cushioning. I’m a guard who changes direction a lot and these do everything for me. 🔥🔥🔥

The traction pattern gives excellent grip on the hardwood and the traction grooves are spaced so that dust doesn't get trapped and cause slipping. The rubber seems to be very durable and I expect this shoe will last. I would recommend this shoe to anyone who is serious about basketball.
