reviews.title: Stylish yet functional
reviews.body: These are some of the nicest cleats I have seen and owned. They are stylish and I love the color scheme and design. I also like the stretchable foot opening and how there is not a true "tongue" on the shoe as I don't have to worry about the tongue sliding or moving and causing discomfort. This however does make them a little snug to get on/off. I got my normal size and this has been the case but I expect them to stretch a little with wear. I'd imagine for people with wider feet, this could be an issue and they may need to size-up. I also like the extra cushioning around the heel portion for added comfort (pictured) as well as the breathable material throughout the shoe. Overall this is an awesome shoe and I would highly recommend.
Nike a atteint la perfection avec la vapor 13.

reviews.title: Beautiful, well made cleats
reviews.body: These Nike Cleats are gorgeous and extremely well made. They feel and look very high end. The fit is made for someone with a small, narrow fit. My husband sized up half a size and he would really need to size up an entire size for these to fit comfortably. They’re narrow and stiff so with socks on you may even need more than an entire size up. I love the look and feel of the cleats. They’re extremely durable and look like they will last many seasons of soccer! Once my husband gets these in the right size I do think they’ll be very comfortable and be appropriate for long term wear. They definitely need to be broken in because they’re very stiff shoes. Overall, they’re nice. I’d just recommend trying the shoes on in the store before buying them because of the sizing issues and needing to wear soccer socks with them.

reviews.title: Innovative Cleats
reviews.body: The first thing you notice about the Nike Vapor 14 Elite is how incredibly light they are. At 1/2 lb per shoe, you maximize your endurance with the weightless feeling of the minimal material construction. By design, the shoes fit snugly against the contours of your feet for control and support, while also allowing for natural swelling during activity with their elastic form. The cleats performed exceptionally through various drills after a fresh rain with no loss of agility, and remained comfortable through hours of training. And the NikeGrip insoles have a textured mold to imprint into the shoe to prevent sliding: innovation I wish existed when I played sports in high school. The only drawback with these cleats was when the textured insole wouldn't fit entirely into the grooves of the shoes, creating pressure on the arches of the feet. However, this problem corrected itself after some mild breaking-in of the shoes. Overall, I was very impressed with the Vapor 14 Elite, and I look forward to coaching my kids' soccer team this season.

reviews.title: Nike Vapor 14 Elite lives up to their name!
reviews.body: First of all, right out of the box I LOVED the look of the Nike Vapor 14 Elites, they've got a sleek black modern look with some bright colors mixed in.

reviews.title: great cleat, runs snug
reviews.body: Found the shoe ran snug, was hard to get on. Once on, super comfortable and easy to move around in. Lightweight, you don’t feel them on. I was initially concerned about durability but I have practices in them 3-4 times and wear appears to be minimal.

reviews.title: Awesome soccer shoes
reviews.body: Loved the fit. It is close enough to offer for touch on a ball. Good lock in on the ankle felt a lot of support there. The boot does require some break-in period to really be comfortable.

reviews.title: Premium. Lightweight. Durable.
reviews.body: These are very stylish, cool looking Nike soccer shoes! The design is what initially drew my husband to them and once he tried them, he loved how lightweight they were. He was very impressed with the quality of the material and loved the way they have a supportive structure that wraps around his feet.

reviews.title: Nice Cleats Provide Good Ball Feel
reviews.body: I got the Nike Vapor 14 Elite for my husband. He has played soccer his whole life and through college at the Division 1 level, so he’s a bit picky with cleats. He was excited to get these and loved the color pattern on the shoe. He wore them while playing and said they have a good fit, with good ball feel. The form-fitting sock-like nature of the shoe gives a smooth feel on the foot and better touch on the ball. The cleats seem durable and will likely hold up well on both hard and soft ground. They run a bit narrow, though, but his foot is also wide, so keep that in mind if you have wide feet. Overall, these are great soccer cleats and he recommends.

reviews.title: Comfortable and great design
reviews.body: It’s been about a week since I’ve had these Nike shoes. I have to say I fell for the design right away, just my style with the black and red. It was a bit of a tight fit at first, but that was expected with new shoes. It fit perfect but without socks, have to break them in first and try with. I tried Jumping, running, jogging with them as well as kicking around the soccer ball for a few days with my son (see him wearing them in the pic lol). Seems great so far. It came with a sports bag which I appreciated.  All in all, a great pair of athletic footwear and would definitely recommend. Will review again after using them for a bit longer and going to our team games with them.

reviews.title: Awesome cleat
reviews.body: These shoes are awesome for outdoor field sports, specifically soccer, for quick cutting and acceleration. I play soccer on an adults men’s soccer team and these are the best cleats I’ve ever worn. I’d highly recommend if looking for a lightweight but durable shoe

reviews.title: Great looking cleats
reviews.body: These soccer cleats fit perfectly on my 11.5 size feet. The size was accurate and I had no issues with them being to snug. I would say that the design on these are my favorite thing about them. They have style and still remain subtle. Exactly what I look for in my sports gear.

reviews.title: Tight, but tight
reviews.body: These shoes are handsome, unbelievably light and offer fantastic support and traction in both wet and dry conditions ... IF you can get them on. They are more than snug, they are TIGHT. There is a little - a little - room for the toes to wiggle, but putting them on means finding the thinnest socks you can, loosening the laces all the way down, then wiggle, wiggle, wiggle. The Flyknit upper has a little flex, which helps, but it was still a production to get them on the first few times. Once they're on, they're worth it, though. There is a lot of ventilation across the center and above the toebox, and they feel very cool for such a close-fitting shoe. Comfortable to run in, with great traction for agile movement, and they look as fast as they go, too, they're a great choice for a speed-seeking player ... especially if they have narrow feet!

reviews.title: Great for ball control and strikes
reviews.body: The Nike Vapor 14 Elite is an impressively lightweight cleat designed for speed and ball control. It is one of the more minimalist shoes I have worn during games and it is built to fit like a glove. I normally wear a men’s size 11 shoe and that is the size I ordered. For the Nike Vapor 14 Elite, I think a size 10 would have placed the studs in a more optimal position and been a better fit. Still, the thin plastic mesh material and lack of tongue is designed to give a sock feel which was surprisingly comfortable. The shoe felt one with my foot the moment I put it on. The studs, despite being the wrong shoe size, are in the exact right place to elevate speed and ball control. I could immediately notice the difference. Sprinting was easy in these shoes. With the minimalist style, striking the ball felt very similar to being barefoot; however, this also meant it took a little more control for juggling and strikes. The single lightweight spine underneath took some time to get used to and I noticed some instability with side to side movement. The only other downside is the material looks impressive but may not be the most durable. I noticed wear on the studs after just a twenty minute pick-up game; I can only imagine how they will look at the end of the full season. If you want a shoe to do long balls or crosses, this probably is not the best for you. However, if you want good ball control and precise strikes, then this shoe would be perfect.

reviews.title: Nike Vapor 14 Elite Soccer Cleats
reviews.body: The Nike Vapor 14 Elite soccer cleats have a great look to them. The bright colors on the black backing looks really sleek. Unfortunately the cleats do not provide very good support. They are too flimsy. Also if you have wide feet or a high arch these cleats will be very uncomfortable for you. The stretch material on the top of the cleats don't provide enough stretch for people with wide feet. It was very difficult for me to even get them on my feet. By the time my soccer practice was over the top of my foot was rather sore. I wouldn't be able to wear these all day. People with smaller feet would benefit more from these cleats.

reviews.title: Ultimate comfort for long distance runs
reviews.body: These Nike hot orange running sneakers definitely turn heads out in the street. The shoes design such that the majority of the shoe is cushion and support. The top of the shoe is a simple covering with no laces. There is over of inch of comfort between my foot and the road I run on. These shoes are clutch in a long run because it saves the balls of my feet any real impact. I’m not wearing socks with these shoes because it keeps my feet cooler due to the ventilated aspect of the shoes design. My toddler call them my “orange racing moon boots” and we are both convinced that besides comfort it makes me faster as well. Overall good fit, super comfortable, and now my first choice for long distance road running.

reviews.title: Awesome cleats
reviews.body: First off, these are really beautiful cleats. The see through design makes them look great and unique. The boot fit and the laces are great too. I don’t think there’s anything looks wise that I didn’t like about them. As far as fit goes, like most if not all Nike cleats, they’re for narrower feet, wide feet will feel the need to size up even just to get these on and then they won’t be comfortable. The boot style makes these feel so incredibly comfortable and they practically weigh nothing, running and kicking feels good. These stand up to daily kicking around really well, and in actual play I felt pretty nimble in them. Honestly my favorite thing about these boots is how light they are, they really feel so comfortable. I think the only thing that I would call a downside is that they are narrow and the boot style doesn’t make getting them on any easier at first. For me, these were almost the perfect boots.

reviews.title: Comfy and durable
reviews.body: I gave these to my husband to test out and he loved them. He dappled in soccer a bit and plays on occasion but needed something that wouldn't have him sliding all over the field. These are perfect and fit his foot just right. It's difficult to find a good pair of cleats, but these are a winner!

reviews.title: Great Shoe, Runs Narrow
reviews.body: The Nike Vapor 14 Elite will help elevate your game to the next level. Made from incredibly light material and a minimalist style, these shoes are perfect for wingers and strikers who want to get an edge on the opposition. The central laces do not offer as large of a striking area as offset laces would, but the web-like material of the outer allows for predictable and consistent control and power. The thin spine connecting the heel to the forefoot takes getting used to, and the shoes do run narrow, however the shoes loosen up as they get worn in creating a form fit for optimal use on the pitch.

reviews.title: Light weight
reviews.body: These are a new favorite for outdoor games. They were a bit snug around the ankle area. I felt like there was not as much support as I would have liked. However, they are light weight and actually making playing soccer a lot easier. You can carry these around with few difficulties. I was able to move around much quicker and my recovery on the field was cut in half. They also did not make my feet sweat as much as I thought they would considering the color is black. The designs are different and interesting. Which is why every time I wear them I get a ton of compliments. They are made from materials that provide you with great strides while using. Also they have a padded insole which feels like stepping on clouds. Once breaking them in a bit after a few uses I felt like they became flexible to my foot. You do need to wear them a little bit.

reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable!
reviews.body: The Nike vapor 14 elite are an excellent pair of soccer shoes. Not only do they look unique, sporty, and very solid, they also are extremely comfortable. They fit just right and are true to size. I love how the shoe tongue is built in as part of the shoe which makes it nicely in place during a game and doesn't allow much movement and friction. The Nike brand is clearly displayed and is very visible. I really like how my feet don't get super hot and tired in these shoes especially on turf as it does have some breathable holes built into the design fabric. Very good considering the Texas heat. I can easily wear these shoes through a full 90 minute match with no issues. The cleats themselves are great for control both on grass and turf and have caused me no issues. The only recommendation I would suggest is somehow come up with a way to easily adjust the laces without having to manually do each knot from bottom to top to loosen them up especially since the tongue is now built in. Overall great quality shoes and absolutely love the ball control they provide and the breathability during a fast paced game.

reviews.title: Such Comfortable Cleats
reviews.body: I have always been searching for the perfect pair that won't make my toes hurt from being on the go all day. These cleats are by far the most comfortable pair I have worn since I started playing soccer a year ago. Even though they might look long and narrow from the side, the shoes are actually a great fit for my feet like puzzle pieces clicking together in all the right places. My toes don't hurt from playing numerous hours a day on the field. The bottom of my feet also don't feel like they're moving on sandpaper because the material is too thin. These will last a very long time, made of thick reusable material from the outside to the inside. I love the neon-colored stripes on the side of the cleats making sure no one will crash into me when it's game mode. Plus, bright colors on black would make it stand out even more to other soccer players. My favorite thing about the cleats is the overall quality and the good support I get out of them. One thing I might change though is that, they can make the opening to be 1/2 inch wider so it would have been less difficult to fit into them. Otherwise, everything looks and feels great!

reviews.title: Narrow but high quality
reviews.body: First impression: Looking at the shoes alone was great. They looked like something that would stick out on a shelf (in a good way) and the initial inspection was spot on. I thought the shoes were very cool, high-quality, and some thing I was extremely excited to try out.

reviews.title: Nice cleat but nothing special
reviews.body: The Nike Vapor 14 Elite cleats are nice and seem to work well for playing soccer. They seem to run slightly small and are very narrow. They aren't uncomfortable by any means but I think if they were slightly wider they would be more comfortable to wear for extended periods of time. They are lightweight which is essential for me. The design is appealing. My favorite feature would be the tongue of the shoe, it has a lot of stretch and is attached to the shoe on all sides which helps with the comfort around the top of the ankle. They came with a great drawstring bag for carrying the shoes that matches the cleats. It's nice to keep the shoes in after they have grass and dirt on them separate from everything else in my sports bag. Overall these are a nice soccer cleat but I can't seem to find anything special about them to set the apart from others.

reviews.title: Decent fit, nice design!
reviews.body: Nice balance & weight. Good touch and ball feel.

reviews.title: Amazing soccer cleats
reviews.body: The fit of these soccer cleats are true to size, they are very comfortable and really enjoy wearing them. I love the bright colors on the black, it makes them really stand out.

reviews.title: Nice Cleats!
reviews.body: These run about a half size big. Also if you have a narrow foot, these probably would be a bit wide. The spikes/studs are really great (probably the best I’ve ever had in my entire life of cleats), they grip well when turning. Overall, I will try a half size smaller and look forward to wearing these in my next outdoor league.

reviews.title: Amazing Nike Vapor 14 Elite!
reviews.body: The Nike Vapor 14 Elite has an amazing design which will attract anyone.  I can clearly and definitely say that these pair of shoes are "Neighbors envy, owner's pride".  This shoe features a stripped-down design that uses the minimal amount of materials possible, so that I can play my fastest from start to finish.  The Chevron studs of this show provide multidirectional traction with every step.

This cleat was toss up for my husband, he loved the design and the colors of the cleat but the fit was very slim in width. A little background, my husband helps coach my nephew's baseball league and with that he wears cleats on the field with the boys. He will lightly jog with the boys around the bases, help on the field as needed and is usually in cleats for around 4-6 hours a day on weekends depending on winnings. With that said, he liked that the cleat was neutral compared to his other pairs that are brightly colored pairs.

reviews.title: Sleek with great traction, runs narrow
reviews.body: The cleats have great traction and love the sleek design.. they fit nicely over my arch but run quite narrow as are typical of Nike cleats so may not be good for everyone. I think people with a high arch may also find the cleats to be snug or uncomfortable, but The structure of the cleat fit my foot quite nicely other than the width. I felt like I had a lot of control and a good strike on the ball as well.

reviews.title: Performance in mind!
reviews.body: First off, Kudos to Nike for including the carrying bag with the shoes. This is awesome bc it keeps your shoes from muddying up and/or stinking up your whole bag!

reviews.title: Lightweight and Comfotable
reviews.body: My husband has been using the Nike Vapor 14 Elite cleats now for about a week. We found that they are very comfortable and light weight. They are extremely breathable which is nice and helps with sweating. They seem to be comfortable enough to wear for hours at a time without any discomfort. Shoe fits true to size. The only concern my husband had was the ankle support seems to be lacking, which is a concern when playing soccer. It would be nice if the sides came up a little higher over the ankle. The design is very sleek and not too busy. Overall the cleats are comfortable and seem like they will hold up for years to come.

reviews.title: Great Nike Vapor Cleats
reviews.body: These cleats are great they are snug and do not move around as I run or cut. The snug fit gives great ball control and feel. The texture on the outside is not obtrusive and works great with the ball. Omer all they are extremely light and feel like there is nothing on my feet, I could run in these all day! The studs dig into the ground and give great traction and grip. The stud design is great and gives a step up from other cleats. My only miss on these is that my feet tend to run a little wide and are a little extra snug but as they break in more I feel like that will go away. Over all great cleats that I feel will last for years.

reviews.title: Lightweight and Supportive
reviews.body: These cleats are lightweight and sleek but have all the support I needed for an afternoon on the field. The heel and studs feel solid, without being too stiff.  The shoe is narrow and without a tongue, so it is a bit challenging to get my wide foot in it. Overall, it is comfortable and supportive with a cool look.

reviews.title: Nice, but tight fitting.
reviews.body: These shoes run a little bit small. The shoelaces are thin but aside from that the fabric and construction is of decent to average quality. The sleeve that holds the foot is too snug and caused discomfort on my partner. He disliked that they were hard to get on. He's 6' and around 190-200lbs. They were too large for me in length but not width, and too small for him in width, but fine in length. His size is usually a men's 10 - 10.5, and mine is 8.5 (women's sizing). They are cleats so you wouldn't wear them all day, and as they were ill fitting on my partner's foot long term wear was not an option. I liked the appearance of the shoe but I would change the cuff to stretch a bit more or just to be a slightly wider fit all around.

reviews.title: Very Nice and Flashy
reviews.body: I really liked these cleats. The fit and size were perfect and accurate. The cleats were supportive in the arch and ankle areas. The shoes felt like they were made of high quality materials and built for high level competition. My touch and shooting felt great on the field with shoes. The cleat pattern felt nice and firm on the field. Overall I loved these cleats and can’t wait to enjoy them for many years and soccer games to come.

reviews.title: Nike Vapor 14 Elite Review
reviews.body: I really liked the feel of the cleat. The texture on the outside was pleasing to feel and it also had a positive effect on the movement of the soccer ball when I kicked it. The cleats run a little big, so if you like your cleats tight, I would go a half size down. The design and construction of the cleats are durable and seem to be able to last for a long time before any breaks. The cleat overall is comfortable, but if I could change one thing, I would put more cushion in the heel/Achilles part of the cleat. There isn't a lot of cushion in the back which means there is a greater chance for blisters. My recommendation would be to add more cushion in the back part of the cleat, but overall I really like the cleat.

title: Nike Air Max 97 By You
description: Bring back the nostalgia of long summer days from your childhood with a hot colour palette and a wavy mesh that alludes to the mesmerising optical illusion of heat rising from the tarmac. Classic layers get a new level of appeal with material choices, pop colours and Metallic Silver that hearkens back to the real OG: Nike Air Max 97 By You.

title: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 FlyEase
category: Men's Easy On/Off Road Running Shoes
description: The road is your runway.Get ready to take flight in the workhorse with wings.Launch your daily run with a spring in your step with cushioned support to help fly past your fiercest competitor—yourself.Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a FlyEase entry system that gets you in quickly and easily.

reviews.title: Hyper léger, confortable et réactive
reviews.body: Le produit est idéal pour les séances rapides et la compétition. Hyper léger, confortable et réactif, la gamme pegasus 38 apporte une meilleure respirabilité grâce sa languette respirante comparée l’ancienne version pegasus 37. Au niveau de la durabilité de la chaussure, elle s’use très vite notamment vers l’arrière de la chaussure.

reviews.title: fits like a glove.
reviews.body: these shoes fit perfectly and they feel so good on my feet.  can't wait to put them in for a good run.
Awesome colors ,ease of taking shoes off and putting them on

reviews.title: Triathlon
reviews.body: Bought this shoe on whim to see how it would do in the run portion of triathlons and I must say, I LOVE IT!!! Quick to get on does not slip and I don't even notice it has a zipper when running. Nike, if there is one thing I would like to see would be some drain wholes in the bottom of the shoe. I had a pair of triathlon running shoes that had those and worked great. Please keep making these shoes!!

reviews.title: Great shoe
reviews.body: Great style, fit and very durable. Love this shoe!

reviews.title: Loooove them!!!!
reviews.body: Best sneaker ever!!! I have 2 pairs if these myself. I’m a no shoes indoor household, so the zipper is so easy for quick off and on access!! Got my boyfriend a pair for his bday and we went on a trip to Boston and walked everywhere, he wore his and I wore mine. Miles and miles and our feet felt amazing the entire time. These cradle and Rock your feet abs arches. Plenty of padding and flex.

reviews.title: Great shoe.
reviews.body: Nike needs to make more of this style of sneaker!!!

reviews.title: Like them but....
reviews.body: I just got it and did 1hr run. I like the shoe itself but the new shoe lacing system is useless for skinny feet, there's no way to get the laces tight enough with the new system. It should work with wider feet but it does not work for someone like me with long (14uk) but skinny feet. So the best option to do is to buy non FlyEase model or take the original laces off from shoe and put your own lace

reviews.title: Shoe of the year
reviews.body: It’s easy to get on and off and when zipped up it fits snug light weight it’s a great running shoe and it looks awesome going down the trails

reviews.title: Great shoe great service
reviews.body: Thanks

reviews.title: Amazing, comfortable fit shoe. The flyease makes it easier to slip in and out of the shoe without having to adjust laces and all.
reviews.body: Highly recommend!

title: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38
description: A workhorse built to help power you through every mile of the race, the Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 continues to put a spring in your step, using the same responsive foam as its predecessor.Mesh in the upper combines the comfort and durability you want with a fit that nods back to the classic Peg.Take a cue from the graphics and trek outside, with each new mile adding to your story.

reviews.title: Runs large!
reviews.body: Have been a fan of the pegasus models for some time and this is my third pair. I've always run a 10.5 snugly, but these ones have a thumb's extra length at the toe! Look great but I'd go half a size down.

title: Nike Mercurial Superfly 8 Academy By You
description: Show your team pride in a brand-new Nike Mercurial Superfly 8 Academy By You. Pop your design with an array of colours that reflect your power, speed and agility. Plate options let you pick the traction that's right for your game and a national flag option lets you rep your favourite squad.

title: Nike Air Max 96 II
description: For the first time, the Air Max 96 II returns with a 1–1 remake. Bringing back the sporty aesthetic imagined by famed Nike designer Sergio Lorenzo, with retro colours on a classic '90s construction, it's a return to throwback athletics styling. Nike Air cushioning keeps it comfortable. Long live the bubble.

reviews.body: I love that they retro'd a favorite from 1996. Brings back major nostalgia with spot on Teal color way.  The upper fits true to size and materials seem to be just like OG. Air bags are probably updated as they don't have the seam in the middle. I do feel like they are heavier than I remember, but my memory might not be so accurate after 25+ years!

reviews.title: If you are looking for compliments on your kicks this is the shoe to buy.
reviews.body: Great looking shoe get lots of compliments.

reviews.title: Good retro
reviews.body: I love this Airmax 96 ii mystic teal I had them back in 96’ the only think I wish they  kept the original materials on it, they should have left the front that suede like material instead of the leather they put on the 2021 release

reviews.title: Just like the original
reviews.body: Couldn't believe when I saw these were released again, had to have them.  Just as cool looking and comfortable as the originals 25 years ago.  Slipping them on again took me back to my youth!

reviews.title: OS4L
reviews.body: These shoes make me wanna trap like the 90s. Very comfortable when huggin the block.
I'm 37 yrs young and I remember having these when I was in the 7th grade. These brought back a looott of flashbacks. Yes I would recommend anybody to get these cause they supa tight an they pure 90's

title: Nike Glide FlyEase Premium
description: The world's greatest athletes don't have much time to get from their event to the medal stand.Still in the zone and surging with adrenaline, the last thing they want to do is tie another pair of shoes.The Nike Glide FlyEase offers a hands-free solution with a laceless design you just step into and go.It has soft, springy cushioning and a fit that's snug and plush all-round, ideal for athletes who want a shoe that's quick, easy and comfortable to wear.Made from at least 20% recycled material by weight.

reviews.title: Great sneaker, runs small
reviews.body: This is a brilliant super comfy shoe, looks great on and gives a little hight. They do come up very small, I had to get a size up to fit. But other than that, I love them.

reviews.title: Great sneaker, runs small
reviews.body: This is a brilliant super comfy shoe, looks great on and gives a little hight. They do come up very small, I had to get a size up to fit. But other than that, I love them.

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.body: Hands down the most comfortable shoe I've ever worn in my 63 years! A lase-less shoe that feels like a shoe with lases. no slop feel and perfect fit! They had one pair only, in dark blue at a Nike outlet store. Had they been pink, I would have brought them home and spray painted them black 😎.
Looks good. Comfortable. Easy to put on!

reviews.title: Certified Olympics-fresh!
reviews.body: Great shoe! Feel like an Olympian and wear what the athletes wear. Comfortable, sleek and lightweight. Although, I’d recommend a half size smaller for a more snug fit.
Great Shoe! I would recommend going a half size down for a snug slip-on fit though.

reviews.title: Very helpful for persons with disabilities
reviews.body: I helped my mother order these, she has Parkinson’s which makes using her hands and legs difficult as well as issues with her toes.  These have been a big help, she does wish they came in more colors since her shoe selection is limited.

reviews.title: 80 year old 2 cancer survivor with Parkinsons approves technology but room for improvement
reviews.body: My Father struggles physically day to day, these shoes are helpful to him on his bad days getting in and out - tech needs improvement makes shoe feel “high” my dad says and maybe ankle rolling prone for him . Would love to try go go-flyease for him. Shoe looks good - he thinks recycled materials a
The best
Love the shoe and the look but way to narrow.

reviews.title: 80yo Approved!
reviews.body: Bought these for my 80yo dad who has trouble bending over and tying shoes due to tremors. These are easy for him to slip on and off and he says they are VERY comfortable. He also commented that the shoes still have the same support as his lace ups. Thank You for the Flyease initiative and supporting accessibility!

title: Nike Air Presto
description: With a sleek design that's more comfortable than your favourite T-shirt, the Nike Air Presto is made to feel good and look fast. Its stretchy sleeve creates a cosy, sock-like fit while the super-soft foam adds spring to your step.Put them on and you'll never want to take them off.

reviews.title: Men’s trainers or not
reviews.body: Are these for men …?

title: Nike Air Zoom Alphafly NEXT% Eliud Kipchoge
description: Gear up for your next personal best with the Nike Air Zoom Alphafly NEXT%. Responsive foam is combined with 2 Zoom Air units to push your running game forwards for your next marathon or road race. Graphics and colours nod to Eliud Kipchoge's record-breaking run.

reviews.title: 5 star shoe w/durability issues
reviews.body: A five start shoe in every category except durability.  These shoes are fast, comfortable, and look good but they are definitely not for daily training.  I use this strictly on the road or track for my speed and tempo workouts alternating with the Tempo Next% for my long runs. Ive had them for two months and have 92 miles on them and the sole is already wearing in the forfeit and the outside heal had wore down trem

reviews.title: Fabulous!!!
reviews.body: I Love the bounce and the assist during my run. I just have to get used to it for long runs. I wish this Will be available soon in my country

reviews.title: Perfect but also not perfect
reviews.body: These Alphaflys are next level with the zoom pods and zoom x cushioning. The uppers fit perfectly and I appreciate the breathability of this material. Sizing is true to size (same sizing as the pegasus for me)You really feel like you are being propelled forward with these on!The only issue I have

reviews.title: Great shoe.  Falls apart fast
reviews.body: Game changing shoe for my 50 year old body.  Feel the ability to run harder and recover faster.  Unfortunately, the right heel has started to come apart after 1 month and 30 miles.

title: LeBron 18 'Best 1–9'
description: When LeBron accelerates down the court, he produces tremendous force.The LeBron 18 "Best 1–9" is designed to harness his abilities while helping with the stress he puts on his body.Combined cushioning underfoot allows him to use his power for unstoppable bursts of speed.This eclectic colourway combines hues from some of the most renowned colourways throughout the history of The King's signature line.

reviews.title: Walking on pillows
reviews.body: Soft pillows under my feet 👣

I absolutely love this shoe! I’m 290lbs and athletic, and this shoe holds my foot comfortably in place when I; run, power lift, or during high intensity circuit training. I do wish Nike would start keeping more size 15 in stock in all there shoes. If I had the option I would buy two more pairs.

reviews.title: Fast delivery
reviews.body: Fast delivery shoe comfortable cushion but lose balance not recommended for everyday use

title: Nike Mercurial Superfly 8 Club MG
description: The Nike Mercurial Superfly 8 Club MG sets you up for speed with a seamless fit.Grippy texture on top gives you precise control, while studs on the bottom provide traction for quick cuts and sudden stops.

title: Nike SB Zoom Stefan Janoski FL RM
description: The signature style of Stefan Janoski is reborn in the Nike SB Zoom Stefan Janoski FL RM. From top to bottom, it delivers the flexible performance you need using revolutionary materials. The Nike Flyleather upper, made from at least 50% recycled leather fibre, combined with synthetic materials, uses the back side of the Flyleather, which looks and feels like felted suede.

reviews.title: Plus rien a voir avec les anciennes SB, dommage !!!!
reviews.body: Ces Nike SB ne sont plus plus semblables aux anciennes SB Janoski .  Le design de la chaussure est modifié, il manque ce petit cachet qui les rend classe. Le pire reste le graphisme. A quand des SB analogues au sb Janoski zoom laser orange, villain red, light Redwood, Michael au 10TH Gardener, se white, ect...

reviews.title: Runs Narrow
reviews.body: The shoe runs even narrower than the other Janoskis.  Others usually stretch out a little after some wearing, but this particular material is much stiffer, and is less forgiving.  Very little give if any.

reviews.title: Unimpressed
reviews.body: I’ve purchased Janoski’s before and they were absolutely the perfect shoe. I am not sure if it is because of the new fly leather but in my first 4 hours of wearing them my foot sweat leaked through the sides of the shoe and stained them. This was just kinda disappointing considering I was not skating in them I was just out casually.

reviews.title: Great Skate Shoe!
reviews.body: I'm 15 Years old with a size 16 foot, so i got a big shoe of course and my foot is really wide! This is the only shoe i can wear when i skate and bike because its so comfy!

reviews.title: Love My Janoski Collection!
reviews.body: I love & collect Janoskis because of their style & fit. I use to skateboard back in the day but at 69 I like the grip because I have mobility issues and they are a big help in my efforts to walk. I also love the ankle lock & never having to worry about walking out of them. Especially helpful for staying inside the slip-ons. Love the wild patterns.

reviews.title: First pair of Janoski's
reviews.body: I'm an avid Dunk collector and wearer but these are my first Janoski's and I couldn't be happier. These kicks hit hard with it's subtle mint color and this is the only SB I've had that you can dress-up or go super casual. Looks great in your skating pants and just as great in a pair of jeans or slacks and it's a go-to kick for going for a ride on your deck to the store or a job int

reviews.title: Better in hand
reviews.body: These are well-made, light, and comfortable. These speckled gum soles look much better in person and I am liking the soft texture of the shoe.

title: Nike Air Max 270 Essential
description: Boasting the 1st-ever Max Air unit created specifically for Nike Sportswear, the Nike Air Max 270 Essential delivers visible Air with every step.Updated for modern comfort, it nods to the original 1991 Air Max 180 with its design lines, exaggerated tongue top and heritage tongue logo.

title: Nike Tiempo Legend 9 Elite AG-Pro
description: 1 of our lightest Tiempos to date, the Nike Tiempo Legend 9 Elite AG-Pro lets you go on the offensive with a low-profile design that's reinvented for attackers.The upper has raised textures backed by soft foam pods for precise dribbling, passing and shooting, while studs on the bottom provide traction for quick cuts and sudden stops.

title: Nike Wildhorse 7
description: Take on those tough and extreme trail runs with the rugged build of the Nike Wildhorse 7.Confidently take on rocky terrain with high-abrasion rubber on the outsole that adds durable traction.The upper delivers durable ventilation with support where you need it.Foam midsole cushioning gives a neutral feel and provides responsiveness on every mile.

reviews.title: Excellent product..
reviews.body: Finally a multi purpose shoes (running,walking,golf and work)can’t ask for morel,highly recommended,Pegasus trail next.thanks NIKE 👍🏻👍🏻

reviews.title: Great comfort and traction, and awesome colour scheme!
reviews.body: Really a great shoe. I bought it just a couple days ago for a race, and ran a 6KM in 25:51. The shoes had great traction and the comfort is through the roof. I love the colour scheme, and it doesn't get super dirty easily. The fit is snug but leaves room, and though it is a bit narrow for my foot it stretches out as well. Will edit this after I finish the season, but so far so good overa

reviews.title: Wild horse 7 trail shoe - superb!
reviews.body: What a shoe! Extremely comfortable straight out of the box. Super grip and good cushioning. The neoprene? collar at the back is a very interesting addition and makes the shoe very easy to put on and take off and should also help to stop blisters. Highly recommended

reviews.title: Great shoe
reviews.body: I’ve given these some hammer now, beach running, at the gym and general off roading. They dry out quickly too. They do run large in size.

reviews.title: Worth it
reviews.body: Super light and grippy. The shoes have a lot of padding on the bottom and you do not feel the small rocks you step on. Very springy and comfortable. Seems very well constructed. Probably the best investment for light to moderate summer (not waterproof) hiking or running. If you are using these for hiking just be a ware that there is absolutely no support

reviews.title: Great Trail Shoe
reviews.body: Comfy, great offroad grip, light. Better for cross-country as opposed to concrete.

reviews.title: Used for Spartan Sprint, fantastic!
reviews.body: I bought these to train for and race the Spartan Sprint and they rocked!! The tread on the side helps a lot both in the rugged terrain and when climbing a slipper mud soaked rope. Other racers were struggling to grip the rope with their feet but the side tread on these helped me get a really solid bite. I loved the way the top of the shoe forms close to a seal on my foot, kept a lot of water and mud out.

reviews.title: Hot Shoe!
reviews.body: Very comfortable and durable without looking like a work shoe!

reviews.title: Not for wide feet
reviews.body: Not wide enough, will be returning them to the store.

reviews.title: So beautiful
reviews.body: So beautiful pair of shoes, very comfortable and i love the colour. Plus fit me perfectly

reviews.title: Wonderful running shoe
reviews.body: They are very comfortable, not to narrow of a row box and can stand up to bring work for 12 hours. One of the most comfortable shoes I've ever bought for running.

reviews.title: Feels really good, let’s see after the race
reviews.body: I love funky colors on shoes and this trail shoe had them all. I have been working out in the as I prepare for my Spartan race and everything I want from a shoe it has. You want to put on a shoe and forget you have them on! Yup, check the box. These are them. Breathable on the feet and although a little larger than the others I looked at, they are very light. I also feel supported on the shoe. So far so good. After my race I will update.

reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
reviews.body: This is the first pair of non-Air Max that I have purchased in a long time. I was worried about the comfort. As soon as I put them on I knew I had nothing to worry about. If anything, they were more comfortable than my last few pairs of Air Max. I am very happy with them and will definitely look to purchase more of these in the future!!

reviews.title: Comfort / support / breathable trail shoe
reviews.body: Been looking for a good pair of hiking shoes for some time and these have surpassed my expectations, as my wife had a pair first and said they were good, and I should try, I was so pleased I did.

reviews.title: So GREAT I had to order another pair!
reviews.body: Waited until I ran a solid 150+ miles on these to review and now have to say that it's definitely one of the best trail shoes I've owned from Nike. Love the stable platform, higher cut gaiter, durable grip outer sole, and reinforced toe box! They're now my

reviews.title: Excellent pair of good running shoes
reviews.body: This design is beautiful, the colors are mesmerizing matched. It is super comfortable, and the materials are soft yet cushioned right, they last a very long time, based upon my last pair's experience. Nike gets it right.

reviews.title: Disc golf sneaks
reviews.body: I’ve been using these as my disc golf shoes and wow. Excellent support, super comfortable fit. Just all around fantastic sneak.

reviews.title: Extra Bounce in My Step
reviews.body: I love the Wildhorse, I've only worn them for about a week for walking near by trail and for walking my dog (pavement) and compared to my hiking boots they give me an extra bounce in my step.  I look forward to taking them on a longer trail with some elevation as I am confident they will perform better than any "sneaker" I've used before yet provide me with an option beyond hiking boots where boots aren't required.

reviews.title: Very comfotable
reviews.body: This model is just awesome, it is very comfortable in the trail. The cushion in the heel provides is just right the comfort. The designer got it right...the price is just a bit high, but the comfort makes up for it...!!!
Really comfortable and a big upgrade from previous version.

reviews.title: Love these
reviews.body: I currently have the Wildhorse 6's and they are hands down my favourite running/walking trail shoe.

reviews.title: Mostly very good but slippery in the wet
reviews.body: I've run 130KM (80 miles) in these around the UK on a mix of road, hard pack mud, tree roots, grass, and coastal runs with rocks in sun and rain.  For most shoes I go up half a size but went true to size in these so my feet wont slip inside the show on technical terrain, despite that my feet don't feel squashed even on longer 10KM runs.   Like all my recent Nikes there is a little heel slip but using the extra lace eyelets and a runners knot resolved this for me.  The tongue  is padded so laces don't cause discomfort.  On grass and drier mud, grip is really good.   I also ran on sand dunes and the grip doesn't do well (if anything would) - I think the chevron style of the terra-kiger would do better on that?

reviews.title: Amazing for trails and running
reviews.body: I needed new hiking shoes as well as new running shoes and went with the hybrid Wildhorse 7. Works perfect for both -- super grippy on the track and comfortable and the same goes for the mountain trails. The only complaint I have is the wide heel lends to some instability in the ankle area however I opted for these because of the additional shock absorption at the heel so this is an acceptable compromise for me personally. Even how they are, I ran a trail and had no issues with rolling my ankles. Overall, incredible shoe for the trails as well as running.

reviews.title: Very comfortable
reviews.body: I have several pairs of Terra Kiger 6's which I really like, these blew those out of the water for comfort. They feel like running on a properly cushioned trail. Great shoe, the fit is a little looser than standard Nike imo.

reviews.title: Great ride.
reviews.body: Super comfortable and breathable and very good support.  Can't comment on durability as I just got these.

reviews.title: Blown Away
reviews.body: I was blown away from these shoes by Nike. I am an avid runner and hiker and often run on the Appalachian Trail in New Jersey and Pennsylvania. The Nike Wildhorse 7 shoes did not require any break in period whatsoever. Trails tend to get super muddy and filled with puddles. This shoe has excellent drainage. After stepping on a few puddles as I ran, the water was able to drain from the shoe as opposed to slosh inside the shoe. Overall, this has been my favorite trail shoe thus far and I cannot wait to take it on obstacle course races in the summer!

reviews.title: Nike wildhorse 7
reviews.body: Let’s me start out by saying just how comfortable these shoes are they are literally like walking on clouds. It’s hard to find shoes that are both fashionable and comfortable, but these are both. They fit perfect very true to size. I also love the look of this shoe. It’s very versatile and can go with many different outfits.I went on a pretty difficult hike in this shoe and overall my feet feel great afterwards. They seem to hold up well and very durable. I had them on for 9+ hours and no complaints at all. Overall these are great shoes for all day wear and enjoying outdoor activities. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Great off roader
reviews.body: I got these shoes just in time for my trip to Arizona. I was excited to try these out on the rocky running trails, and for hiking up the steep hills. The Wildhorse’s did not disappoint! Very durable shoe and very supportive. Running over rocks was no problem! I was pleasantly surprised how thick the soles were which helped absorb the impact of the rough terrain. There were some pretty big rocks out there and I could run over them with ease. No issues with sore feet. The Wildhorse’s are slightly heavier than a normal running shoe, but overall not that much of a difference. I was expecting there to be a significant weight difference, but not much at all. The shoes are true to size and fit great. They have nice tread that allow a good grip on the ground and reduce slipping. If looking for a trail running shoe I would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive, and look great
reviews.body: I am very impressed by these shoes. Being Nike, I held them to a high standard. They fit perfectly, which is always something I worry about when getting shoes online. Definitely a true to size fit. The look goes well with either athletic wear or jeans. I have used these both for exercising at the gym and running out to the grocery store. I have worn them for up to 5 hours at a time and my feet did not complain. I am sure I could wear them all day without being uncomfortable. My favorite thing about this shoe is the clean black and white design that helps them go with any outfit. The only con I have noticed is there is sometimes a squeak to the shoes if they get a little wet. The noise isn’t too loud though and I just try to keep them dry. Looking forward to wearing these shoes more during the warmer weather.

reviews.title: Classy and sophisticated
reviews.body: These Nike Wildhorse 7 shoes are built nicely and look fantastic. I love black and white shoes, and these certainly fit the bill. They are easy to wipe down and keep clean and free of dust. The bottoms are great with traction and a good build for basketball and working out. I found them to fit slightly larger than my average shoes in the same size. They are quite comfortable and do give you a nice feel on your feet; where you fee like your getting somewhere with your workout. I would definitely buy these again.

reviews.title: Rugged shoes for outdoor advendtures.
reviews.body: First off i think the shoe looks really nice. The fit was perfect for me once i broke them in. I really liked how much support they offered for whatever i did in them. I have a young son, so i do a lot of running and chasing after him. The bottom of the shoe almost reminded me of cleats(though not quite that extreme) Which made it really comfortable running in the grass/dirt around my home. Even used them on the bike and they were pretty great on there as well. So far so good.

reviews.title: Wild horse 7
reviews.body: At first glance I was not too sure about these shoes. They looked a little strange and I didn’t know what to expect. However, they are extremely light weight especially for having the extra grips/material all over them.

reviews.title: Amazing Grip
reviews.body: I am using Nike Wildhorse 7 from last one month. I wear these shoes while going for running on daily basis on Preston Bridge Trail. They are very comfortable. Its sole is so soft and provide cushion to my foot. The quality of sole is also good that it does not feel that it will crack after a short time. It’s grip is very strong. I’ve never had a more sturdy but well supported shoes. The shoes is excellent for all sorts of terrains even in mud! During a downpour while running on mud I experienced no slippage and was able to make tight turns with no problem. This is a complete package of style and comfort. It looks very stylish. It is Black and White simple and sober. Even I tried this on mountain for tracking over the weekend. The grip is really good. I would definitely recommend these awesome shoes for tracking and trails.

reviews.title: Don’t leave for the trail without these
reviews.body: For the past few years, trail running has been my favorite type of running. Finding the right shoe for the tasks is always a challenge; between weight and durability, finding the middle ground of what works takes time. The Wild Horse fits the bill almost perfectly. Although on the heavier side, the padding in the sole and durable tread on the bottom more than makes up for the difference. The lower cut tops have a nice flexible band that acts as a mini gaiter to keep dirt and small rocks from enter the shoe as well.

reviews.title: Lace them up and go adventure
reviews.body: When you first put this shoe on, you immediately want to hit the trails and go on an adventure. The fit was great, there is a higher piece that sits nicely at the Achilles which offered extra, soft, support for rugged terrain, and no pebbles or sand got kicked into the back of the shoe at all- win!

reviews.title: A great hiking shoe!
reviews.body: When I received the Nike box in the mail I didn’t know what to expect. Upon removing the show from the box I thought how well designed the Wlidhorse 7’s are. Very stylish for a trail shoe, the ridges on the bottom gave it a very sporty/ cleats look. When I tried them on my foot immediately felt comfy inside. Not too tight but the perfect amount for a active person. I actually got a chance to go to a pretty rocky trail with them and while they are extremely durable and comfortable to hike in, the ridges on the side take some getting used to or else it could feel off balance. All around this shoe is perfect for any active person who will be doing any sports or hiking. It will keep your feet comfy and safe all while looking extremely stylish.

reviews.title: Comfy Running Footwear
reviews.body: I didn't expect these Nike Wildhorse 7 to be as comfortable as I thought at first because they looked chunky in appearance when taking them out of the box. I seemed to have picked a pair by half a size bigger (size 8.5) than my feet, but should fit not too badly with thick-layered socks. However, I was very wrong. My feet felt like a comfortable grip; all wrapped up inside a pillow with soles thicker than regular running shoes. These are suitable and supportive for biking, hiking, jogging, camping or just doing lots of walking in the city. The black-and-white design is a color I would wear everyday since they're easy to match with outfits too. The ridges underneath prevent me from slipping and falling on my face. Plus, the bottom is durable but not made of thin material, so my feet don't feel like I'm walking on sandpaper all day. Since all my expectations are met as of now, I can't seem to think of anything else that might need an improvement whether it's the design or stability.

reviews.title: Comfortable, supportive Shoe
reviews.body: As someone who battles shin splints and plantar fasciitis, the Nike Wildhorse 7’s are the best trail running shoes I have ever worn! They are supportive, especially around the ankle, yet extremely comfortable. I have mid arches and find that these are a perfect match and true to size.

reviews.title: Made for Trail Running
reviews.body: I grew up running track and cross country and have continued my love for running in a non competitive environment. These shoes are fantastic for running in grassy areas or dirt trails; there’s a noticeable difference between these shoes and shoes that are more generic “running shoes.” First, they provide great tread due to the deeper grips on the bottom of the shoes. They also provide a slight lift in the heel while running—making it easier to run in rougher terrain—but not so much lift where you are worried the shoe will come off or cause injuries due to the lack of ankle support. They’re also very comfortable and breathable; I barely noticed I was even wearing shoes while running. Not to mention, they look great!

reviews.title: Comfortable
reviews.body: These shoes are like floating on water, I am able to walk, run and hike with no effort! They are so comfortable and don't leave my feet aching after a long run or hiking. I would recommend these any day, I was a little shocked at the price but after wearing these they are worth every penny in comfort. I have back issues and have had back surgery so finding comfortable shoes to walk, hike and run in are a must and with these shoes I would say I've found the jackpot!

reviews.title: Nice stability and support
reviews.body: Being very tough on my shoes, it’s hard to find ones that stand up to the elements like this one.  I’ve worn these both indoors and outdoors for running and basic exercise and am impressed with the comfort, durability and stability they provide. I’ve gotten them quite a bit dirty and they hose off honestly so easily to be like new!

reviews.title: Optimal amount of cushioning with a solid balance between comfort and durability
reviews.body: My first impression of the Wildhorse 7's was a robust trail running shoe that offered thorough support from heel to toe. I'm a fan of the visual appeal of the shoe too - it's nice to see trail running shoes that are stylish and didn't look out of place when I dropped into my local coffee shop after a run.

reviews.title: Comfortable Trail Runners
reviews.body: The Nike Wildhorse 7 shoes are comfortable and supportive trail runners. They provide a soft and squishy feel while remaining rigid enough for serious trail running. I particularly like the nubby soles as they provide great traction on loose gravel and dirt. The fit is true to size. The design of the shoe is attractive and "looks" the part for a trail runner sneaker. However, I do wish that these came in more fun colors. These shoes proved to be comfortable for trail runs in the three to five mile range.  I also anticipate wearing these as my primary backpacking shoes as they are rather lightweight. The construction seems durable, so I imagine these will serve me well for some time. My favorite aspects of these shoes are the comfortable fit and solid traction. I would recommend these to trail runners and backpackers.

reviews.title: Great all-around athletic shoe
reviews.body: I was looking for an active shoe with a more substantial sole and I found it with these Nikes.  I live in a very active community and I take advantage of all the stuff - hiking, biking, running, etc.  These are my new go-tos.  Great for running on bumpy sidewalks as well as dusty/muddy trails.  Great for casual biking.  And they look good enough to wear with jeans for my weekend errands.  These really had no break-in period - they were ready to go right out of the box.  My normal runs are around 5 miles and so far, these have excelled.  Definitely recommend!

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.body: These shoes are super comfortable. The fit is just right. I wear them everywhere I go.

reviews.title: Very durable comfortable outdoor shoes
reviews.body: I am size 8 men’s and the fit and feel was just right. Wasn’t too big or too small which was great. I actually enjoy the design it is very unique, and different and that’s what caught my eye. I am very outdoors person so being out on trails this shoe was very comfortable all day! I mostly like the color (black) and design also the comfort for being a hiking/ trail shoes. 10/10 I love these shoes

reviews.title: Nike's running comfort brought to the trail
reviews.body: My trail running shoes usually are from typical outdoor brands that are more bulky and and rigid. The comfort and support of this Nike shoe feels like you are running in slippers. You get the bounce and support of their running and sprinting shoes which make roots feel like nothing. The tread is cleat-like so you don't have slippage. The laces lock your heel in pretty well and I have not had any hot spots, which I always deal with when I start a new shoe! Durability wise, these should last. They have reinforced rubber on the toe and heel so you won't get those stick/rock holes. Also, these have a super smart feature where you have elastic that wraps around your ankle to prevent rocks from entering your shoes. No more need for gaiters! I don't know why more shoes/boots don't have this feature and would have killed for this backpacking with trail shoes out west where everything is dusty.

reviews.title: Nike Wildhorse 7 Shoes
reviews.body: The Nike Wildhorse 7 shoes are a great shoe for on and off the trail. Very comfortable. Lots of heel support, which I need as I often end up with a sore heel after a long run on a trail. Tread design provided lots of traction on loose dirt and gravel trails. Love the pull loops on the back for putting on quickly. Breathable mesh uppers help air circulation and prevent hot/sweaty feet. I could easily wear these all day if needed. Styling is great as well. Love the mountain graphic design on the back. It’s a great touch for these shoes which are meant to be worn off the beaten path. I can’t think of any improvements needed. They met all of my expectations.

reviews.title: An absolute triumph
reviews.body: Couldent be happier wouldent change a single thing and I am the pickiest person when it comes to shoes. Im in absolute awe of much these exceeded my expectations. I could go on and on but I’ll just leave it at that try them There is no mistake. And yes totally True to to size

reviews.title: Best Nike trail shoe by far!
reviews.body: I own both the pegasus trail 2 and the GTX version and this is by far the best, the traction is great on muddy British soil and its very comfy when transitioning to gravel/road, the shoe shines on compact dirt and is a bit unstable on rocky terrain, mostly due to the react technology but it will do the job.

title: Nike Tiempo Legend 9 Academy MG
description: 1 of our lightest Tiempos to date, the Nike Tiempo Legend 9 Academy MG lets you go on the offensive with a low-profile design that's reinvented for attackers.The upper has raised textures backed by soft foam pods for precise dribbling, passing and shooting, while studs on the bottom provide traction for quick cuts and sudden stops.

reviews.title: The perfect boot, have moved to 3G of late this boot is just right the feel and control of the ball is what you need.
reviews.body: Mega fast delivery, great boot , feels great to wear perfect

title: Nike Phantom GT Elite By You
description: Take our most innovative boot to the next level in the Nike Phantom GT Elite By You. After analysing thousands of football-specific moves, a tacky material was added to the Flyknit construction to give you better touch and control of the ball. Add a Dynamic Fit collar for a feel with even more control or go with a low-cut boot; then choose the traction that makes sense for your game.

title: Nike Mercurial Superfly 8 Club IC
description: The Nike Mercurial Superfly 8 Club IC sets you up for speed with a seamless fit.Grippy texture on top gives you precise control, while a herringbone pattern on the bottom provides better trapping during small-sided games.

title: Nike Phantom GT Elite By You
description: Take our most innovative boot to the next level in the Nike Phantom GT Elite By You. After analysing thousands of football-specific moves, a tacky material was added to the Flyknit construction to give you better touch and control of the ball. Add a Dynamic Fit collar for a feel with even more control or go with a low-cut boot; then choose the traction that makes sense for your game.

title: Nike Air More Uptempo
description: First released during the high-flying era of '90s basketball, the Nike Air More Uptempo has seamlessly transitioned from an on-court icon to a streetwear statement shoe.With its distinctive over-branding, powerfully built profile and Nike Air underfoot, there's no mistaking its place in sneaker history.

reviews.title: Air More Uptempo Peace Love Swoosh
reviews.body: Th Air Uptempo's have always been a classic shoe, love the oversize graphics, this model with all the color and all makes quite a statement, awesome shoe!

title: Nike Air Max 2021
description: We could use a lot of superlatives to describe the Nike Air Max 2021.We could tell you that we've incorporated recycled materials to design a sneaker with at least 20% recycled content.Or that the new Air cushioning unit underfoot is our most revolutionary.Perhaps we'd call it the "the pinnacle of comfort"; waxing poetic about the cored-out foam midsole that gives you the lightest, softest feel.But maybe we just say it's modern meets technical with a splash of heritage DNA.What fun is there in giving away the surprises?

I have worked out in them and worn them at work.  In both situations, they responded well.  Aesthetically, they look fabulous.  MOST IMPORTANTLY, the extra-large bubble in the heel gives

title: Nike Air Max Plus
description: Let your attitude have the edge in your Nike Air Max Plus, a Tuned Air experience that offers premium stability and unbelievable cushioning. Featuring the OG's wavy design lines, TPU accents and airy mesh on the upper, it celebrates defiant style.

title: Nike Tanjun
description: "Tanjun" means "simplicity" in Japanese, and the Nike Tanjun Shoe is simplicity at its best. It has a modern look and its design is convenient and comfortable, while a sleek upper gives a clean look and fit.

reviews.title: Light and comfortable but didn't last long.
reviews.body: I bought these about a year ago and when I got them I was very happy with them, they're really light and probably the most comfortable trainers i've owned. After a while, however, the front of the shoe began to rip and sole wore out a lot. I can no longer wear them when it is wet outside as there is virtually no grip left. They were nice whilst they lasted and are a decent price but I wouldn't recommend them in the long run.

I probably wore them about 20 times and holes just appeared in them (see photo). They are made from a soft mesh which isn't very durable. Other reviews say something similar, beware.

Being a cashier I'm on my feet for 8+ hours a day, and the Tanjun's always keep me on my A game for work.

reviews.body: These are great everyday shoes. They are comfortable and fit well. I would recommend this shoe to everyone.

reviews.title: Most Comfortable Shoes!
reviews.body: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. Comfy for running and everyday wear. They are also easy so keep clean. I would definitely recommend these shoes for anyone who wants a good looking comfortable shoe.

title: Nike Mercurial Superfly 8 Elite By You
description: Every layer of the Nike Mercurial Superfly 8 Elite By You was built to enhance your game, bringing together the essential components for speed, optimal touch and dependable traction. Highlight the technological mastery of your boots and your moves with a new design console that gives you even more control over your look on the pitch.

title: Nike Air Zoom Tempo NEXT% FlyEase
category: Men's Easy On/Off Road Running Shoes
description: The ultra-responsive Nike Air Zoom Tempo NEXT% FlyEase is designed to help you get the most from your training runs, so you can go confidently into your next (or first) race.It has a step-in entry and an internal lacing mechanism you operate with one hand.Pull one loop to tighten, another to release.

reviews.title: Love these shoes... if they were only sized right
reviews.body: no doubt about it, the shoes are damned comfortable, with a great cushion, support, and spring for my cross-fit workouts. The problem is that for the 'step-in' to work, you need to order at LEAST a half size up, if not a full size, if you want to wear a sock. And I've been looking on a literal weekly basis, but apparently Nike doesn't make anything bigger than a 12 in these... Come'on Nike, can I get a 13?!

reviews.title: The comfort of the shoe
reviews.body: It’s very soft and fit to size lots of support and nice looking

reviews.title: Next % , Next Level Speed
reviews.body: The plate and teo zoom bags with 15lbs/sq" makes it a super responsive speed shoe. The run and energy return is fantastic, you feel the COG push you forward and the spring zoomX throw the energy back into your every stride. Fly ease is a new tech, one which will become morr robust and standard so get use 2 tabbed runners, its easier than lacing and more reinforcing. These r t

reviews.title: So in love with these shoes!!!
reviews.body: The best shoes I’ve ever owned!! Quality, comfort and responsiveness is just unreal with these shoes!!! Great job Nike!

reviews.title: I recommend for runners
reviews.body: Great shoes super comfortable for running night buy a second pair

reviews.title: Running smooth
reviews.body: Sneakers are great to run in. Had to up size by 0.5
Le flyease serre un peu sur le haut du pied le reste est  très confortable

reviews.title: too snug
reviews.body: not the ideal shoe if you have feet with high arches

reviews.title: Perfect for people with mobility disabilities
reviews.body: My wife’s disabled and these were a game changer for her for walking and exercise

The sole on the shoe absorbs impact beautifully but the shoe itself runs entirely too small. I wear a size 12 and had to order a size 13 and it’s still tight. Great shoe if you can figure out the right size to buy.

reviews.title: I shopped around!
reviews.body: I got the illest kicks I’ve ever seen in my life. I got them at a great price shipping only took a couple days and I have never been happier! No place better than nike.com

reviews.title: Comfy
reviews.body: Nice light shoe that's super comfy. The lacnig system is different and takes getting use too.

reviews.title: Top mais
reviews.body: Il faut prendre une taille ou une demie taille au dessus.

reviews.title: walking on clouds?!
reviews.body: I am a huge fan of ZOOM air! these are the most comfortable sneakers in the world! if you suffer from callouses..like i do in my right for-foot.. this shoe will provide great relief for you!

reviews.title: Cutest Shoe with the Most Cushion
reviews.body: I love these shoes! They could only be made better by offering a less restrictive Flyease contraption. It's hard and causes pressure on the top of my foot as I am running at times. Otherwise, I am very pleased with my purchase. I love how wide the sole is because I have bunions and the sole provides great support and cushion. Love it!

reviews.title: A tempo shoe that does the running for you
reviews.body: This is definitely a tempo shoe, so the name is appropriate. They still feel great at slower speeds, but a little big and clumsy, and the thick sole feels less stable. I've tried this shoe with traditional lacing. I prefer the look of the Flyease and they go on just as easily as claimed, but they're not as secure as traditional lacing. The upper on these makes me more confident investing in white shoes- they're much easier to clean than flyknit, almost wipe clean with water. Also, they run SMALL! If I got the appropriate size for length, I feel like I'd be swimming in the mid and forefoot of the upper due to lacing. I'm returning and hoping the next iteration features a more functional speed lacing system. If I had more dough, I'd keep these for tempo runs and just to wear around bc they look so so good.

reviews.title: The sole is amazing, the laces not so much
reviews.body: The sole of this shoe is the best I've ever had for daily runs - super comfortable for someone who tends to get beat up by the pavement.  However, the lace system isn't ready for prime time, IMO.  It doesn't consistently cinch in the same places or even uniformly across the foot - it tends to be tighter in some areas than others, often leading to a fair degree of restriction.  I love the idea and only wish they actually lived up to the intent of the design.
These are truly multipurpose shoes. Can be used like running shoes as well as tap dance shoes!!!

reviews.title: Awesome shoes
reviews.body: Awesome shoes great support and all through my run both on pavement and treadmill would definitely recommend

reviews.title: Very comfortable for working out but annoying tapping sound
reviews.body: These shoes are pretty great. I’ve worked out in these pretty often after purchasing and they’ve held great on the treadmill and indoor gym. It snows so no outside running yet.

reviews.title: So far, so good!
reviews.body: I've had these shoes for over a month now and have used them quite a lot. They are very comfortable and have held up very well. The only issue I had with them is that they tend to run small, so i had to get a half size larger. Otherwise, they are great shoes and so far I'm very happy with them!

reviews.title: Great shoe, laces not so much
reviews.body: Average between 30-50 miles a week, 50/50 road and gravel. I absolutely love the alphaflys but the soles are easily shredded on the gravel.  The tempos are excellent shoes but little tight around the ankles.  The flyease are much more comfortable around the ankle, easy to put on and off.  Now it’s maybe just bad luck but I have bought two pairs and both have had the flyease lacing break. The first pair I decided to keep and just made them into standard laces. The second pair I’ll probably return. Would love to see Nike make this shoe with standard lacing, as for me, would be a perfect running shoe.  Also the do squeak terribly, I mean really loud.  As I only use them for outdoor running no biggie, but if your someone who would wear these daily then it’s gets irritating very fast.

reviews.title: Unfortunately good
reviews.body: Great running shoe. Very light and have a great feel when running. The heal support is a great balance between nothing and just enough.  Fabric is good and are a good fit. The flyease is ok but won’t change your world. If anything it takes up too much room and you could go without. But the overall comfort, weight, design and performance is second to none

reviews.title: Really great comfort but the lacing system needs some work
reviews.body: The shoe has a very soft yet responsive cushioning but does have some slight instability in the heel since it is so high off the ground so that is a factor to keep in mind.

reviews.title: So far so good...
reviews.body: Decent training shoe with a Light weight and fairly supportive feel. Good tweener if you want more cushion than a Metcon and more support than a running shoe.  They did feel a bit clumsy initially due to the way the  lower is constructed.  But definitely a fan

reviews.title: The Loudest Shoes
reviews.body: These are generally comfortable shoes with a lot of spring in their step.  But they are the loudest shoes I've ever worn.  They're kinda clunky and make crinkly noises from the ball of the foot.  I definitely won't be sneaking up on anyone!  But seriously, it gets super annoying very quickly.

reviews.title: Most Comfortable
reviews.body: If you like comfortable shoes, no need to look any further. The technology built into this shoes is amazing! The fit a bit snug, but still extremely comfortable. I loved them so much I ordered another pair in a different color. The support feels amazing! I would recommend this shoe to anyone even if you do not run in them.

reviews.title: Impressed completely
reviews.body: Honestly, quite possibly the most advanced technical shoe on the market today, maybe ever!

reviews.title: All good apart from Lace system
reviews.body: everything on this shoe is good , the sole has got supreme comfortability  , its light and its got the grip i need for wetter conditions ,

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.body: The fit is superb . Amazingly you step into the shoe by crushing the heel which then slides up   . A simple pull of the band on the top of your foot and your locked and ready to go, it feels like the shoes are welded to your foot. They are  supremely comfortable with explosive performance. My PB has been shattered and I’m now running times I never believed possible. At the end of the run, you simply pull the bottom loop to release then pull off the shoe. Expensive but worth every penny

reviews.title: Perfect winter running shoe
reviews.body: Bought this for running on winter mornings. Incredibly comfortable and quick running shoe.

reviews.title: Love them makes you feel like you could run
reviews.body: Brilliant super comfy true sizing also the tag on the front takes a bit to get used to it a tab to tuck it into may be helpful

reviews.title: Best value and new tech in this shoe
reviews.body: This shoe combines all of the latest running tech - refined - tested - updated - value for money. The sole will last and provide very good grip. This shoe evolves from the VapourFly to provide an affordable great road running shoe. Enjoy!!

title: Nike Air Force 1 Crater Flyknit
description: Your modern take on the hoops icon, the Nike Air Force 1 Crater Flyknit updates classic b-ball style with at least 20% recycled materials by weight.The super-airy Flyknit upper features a linen-like texture while the speckled Crater foam midsole adds a modern twist. It's legendary style that's on-point and lets you give a little back with every step.

reviews.title: Great casual shoe!
reviews.body: The fit and the look is just what I was looking for! Lightweight and comfortable too. Gotta get the other colorways!

reviews.title: Great sneaker for hot climates
reviews.body: These are the first Nike's that fit me - very comfortable, unlike other models that I tried on. I live in a very hot climate with temperatures above 100°F for several months and even now, in October, over 8

reviews.title: Great kicks

They're wide in the toe box which is great for people with wide feet like me. They breath well and are comfortable with or without socks. However, they are tight around the ankle

reviews.title: My favorite AF1
reviews.body: Super lightweight and comfortable, totally different than your regular AF1’s (in a good way)

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.body: I ordered an 8.5 which is my usual size but they were a bit tight so I had to size up. Other than that, they're super comfortable and look great too. They are also very light in weight which is nice. Highly recommend. 👍

reviews.title: Terrific with one huge Flaw
reviews.body: These are a terrific iteration of the Airforce sneakers. Comfortable, breathable, and recycled! But Nike missed the mark on one huge detail, the red thread used inside the shoe for the white colorway bleeds onto the flyknit body. This is with NO WASHING and minimal wear. There is now a slight red stain all around where the sole and flyknit

reviews.title: Great look
reviews.body: I love the trainers they look great and fit perfectly
Super comfortable to wear for any occasion. Love the fit and the style of the shoe.

reviews.title: Flexible
reviews.body: Have bought AF1's in the past and found the to be too stiff.  Crater foam insole is much softer and flexible than standard AF1.

reviews.title: Wide Feet? High Instep? You'll want 3 pairs.
reviews.body: Truly a phenomenal shoe! I have a wide foot and high instep, and these shoes fit PERFECTLY when I put them on. They were a little difficult to slip on, but once I loosened the laces they slid on with ease. My only reservation about these shoes is that the "Flyknit" technology is not as stretchy as I thought it would be. I'm used to the Infinity Run Flyknit shoes that conform around the foot, and the AF1s are not as stretchy as those. That's okay though, because they're actually kind of wide. Needless to say they've become my everyday shoe. I plan on buying more pairs in different colors. I'm tempted to buy OG AF1s, but I'm not sure that they fit the same as these.

reviews.body: Love Nike &  their shoes but they have been coming boxed in just the original shoe box and not packed in a proper box with the Nike tape.. I am not ga w 4 stars for that reason. 5 star for the shoes….

reviews.title: Great design and I love the sustainable design
reviews.body: First off props to Nike on the sustainable design they are moving in the right direction. Perfect fit I love the breathable design due to the flyknit and they are so light weight and comfortable ! Ordered both the black/light blue and the all white pair they will be worn often

reviews.title: Great Fit

The flynit material adds to the sock like feel that's an improvement over leather. The fit is not the same as regular forces however. These fit more true to size/slightly small. I recommend going with either your regular size or a half size up.
