reviews.title: Love the look, not good for thick feet?
reviews.body: I have mixed feelings about the Nike Victori One Slide.

reviews.title: Awesome Slide
reviews.body: This slide is extremely comfortable and fits very well. When I first received the shoe, I did think that it was bit bulky looking. I made an initial judgment of the shoe based off the aesthetics alone. However, once I actually tried the shoes on, my feet were in heaven. I have somewhat of a high arch, and the slide accommodates that. My foot is also very narrow so I thought the shoes might feel larger because of that combined with the bulkiness. I was wrong. The shoe fit like a glove with just enough length and width. I have not had the opportunity to wear the shoe all day, but wearing it for the several hours that I have so far has convinced me that the shoe would be comfortable to wear all day. Slides like these are my go-to for something quick to put on my feet to walk around the house or run some errands. It is beginning to warm up where I am so I have not worn them with socks, but I would imagine that the slides would work really well with socks too. My favorite part of the  slide is the design on the portion of the shoe that covers your foot. The neutral colors allow it to pair with most things that I wear. The versatility and comfortability of the slides make them a great choice for this type of shoe, and this is saying a lot from someone who loves these types of slides.

reviews.title: So comfortable!
reviews.body: I got these for my husband to replace his old flip flops and he is in love! It’s just starting to be warm enough to venture out in these in the Midwest, but he’s even been wearing them around the house instead of slippers! They fit perfectly and are super comfortable. Can’t really speak to durability yet since they’re pretty new, but they seem well-made and like they should last a while. However, he loves them so much, he might get another pair just because!

reviews.title: Easy to wear
reviews.body: These slides are great to slip on and off quickly. I keep them by the door and use them often. They are very comfortable and have great amount of cushion so can wear longer periods of time. Fit is true to size (same as my normal athletic shoe size) and the foot strap feels nice and secure but is not too tight. Great color options. Would recommend.

reviews.title: Supportive Lightweight Nonslip Slippers
reviews.body: Very impressed by the quality and durability of this men's slide. I don't like to wear outdoor shoes in the home, and wanted something lightweight, durable, with cushion and arch support. The style is easy to slip on and off and can easily be rinsed off and cleaned. True to size with no annoying edges. I was worried the sole would be slippery, but the slide is surprisingly grippy and quiet. Would be perfect for a day at the beach or pool. 5 stars all around.

reviews.title: Comfortable and durable!
reviews.body: Overall my husband felt the quality and durability of the sandal was great. He would definitely recommend these comfortable sport sandals. Below is a short list of pro/cons.

reviews.title: Great for everyday wear
reviews.body: These sandals are incredibly lightweight (excellent to pack for a beach vacation!) , super cushiony and the perfect sandal for everyday wear - a great “house slipper”. They fit true to size and have great arch support; a big win. We don’t have an opinion about durability because he’s only worn them for a couple weeks. So far, so good!

reviews.title: Stylish, casual slide
reviews.body: These Nike slides are so squishy and comfortable!  As with most Nike shoes, the do run about 1/2 size smaller than other brands, so if you are in between sizes, I would recommend sizing up. I really like that the strap is nice and snug and keeps your foot in place. The footbed has a nice contoured shape that forms well to your foot as well. So easy to slip on while running out the door. Definitely the perfect casual sandal for running errands or doing work around the house.

reviews.title: Extremely comfortable slide
reviews.body: I've enjoyed wearing these slides, they are comfortable, simple in design, and great for someone active. The uppers of the shoe are made of synthetic leather which is comfortable and durable enough for daily use. Because they're slide-on they are perfect for taking on and off for quick errands. These slides don't have an adjustable strap or any velcro which makes them very comfortable and reduces the chance that they'll slip off on accident. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Most Comfortable Slides EVER!
reviews.body: These Nike Victori One Slides are the most comfortable slides you'll ever put on.  i've worn other Nike Slides and they are also great, but these Victori One Slides have way softer foam, more durable and cushioned straps, and the contoured heel support is unreal. I love overall welcoming design, grip design on the soles, and the Camo print color way. I've walked in these slides everyday for a week and they only get more comfortable as you break them in. The thing I love most about these slides is the true comfort and cushion support you get. If there was anything i could change would be added rubber later on the sole to provide additional grip and durability. I would recommend everyone to pick up a pair or 2!

reviews.title: Walking on clouds.
reviews.body: The fit of this slide is superb, and the feel of the sole is super soft squishy and comfortable you kind of just melt into them when your walking around.

reviews.title: Comfort and versatility
reviews.body: The Nike Victori One slide is a comfortable and convenient shoe for casual wear, pool or beach footwear, or just slippers around the house. It fits true to size and is cushioned nicely with decent arch support. I did not particularly care for the pattern and would have preferred a solid color slide, but I did appreciate that it was a neutral color scheme so the camo pattern did not jump out too much. I did not wear the shoe all day long as the weather in my area is currently too cold, but it seems very convenient for all day wear. I appreciated the mesh lining under the top of the slide.

reviews.title: Comfortable and Good fit
reviews.body: The Nike sandals have a very comfortable fit. They have a soft rubber sole with a good texture making them feel slip resistant. I like the camo design and the breathable material without the strap. I really like the light weight of the sandal. If I could change anything it would be to add some type of air flow holes in the sole to prevent the bottom of my foot from sweating.

reviews.title: Versatile, very comfortable shoes
reviews.body: I got these Nike Victori One Slides for my husband. He likes the idea of flip-flops but hates having something between his toes, so these are perfect for him. His feedback has been positive about these shoes; I actually caught him trying to leave the house in these, in the middle of winter, with socks on, so I would say he loves them! He would wear them all day if I let him, but that will have to wait for warmer weather when he is willing to wear them sockless. He is very impressed that these have nice arch support, and he loves the soft padded top strap that is aerated underneath so that his feet can breathe. He says that they fit well and are quite comfortable. Being used to traditional flip-flops, he was concerned that they would slide off when walking, but he finds that they stay on no problem. The only complaint that he has had is that there is a groove on the bottom of the sandal that makes the heel squish down pretty far, and he feels it would be better if it had a solid bottom, perhaps with some extra cushioning at the heel. That being said, he is a pretty big guy so it probably wouldn’t be an issue for most people, and it is a minor complaint for him anyways.  These have become his go-to shoe and he would recommend them for anyone looking for a great all-around sandal.

reviews.title: Cushion for tired feet
reviews.body: These are a basic, cushiony slide. The strap was a little tight at first but stretched out to a more comfortable fit within a day of wear. There is slight arch support and only a slightly molded footbed. They do tend to make my feet a little hot, but my feet always run a bit warm. The slides are great for putting on after a long day of work. I’m not a huge fan of the urban camo look so I don’t plan on wearing these in public. They’re a nice around the house, comfort slide.

reviews.title: Super comfortable slides
reviews.body: I am loving the Nike Victori One Slides! One thing I will say is that they seem to run a little small, I'd size up one size. They are super comfortable, the design is current and cool, and they are so easy to slip on and off. I've been wearing them around the house almost every single day since I got them (still too cold where I live to wear them outside) and I am very happy with them. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Fighting over who gets to wear them
reviews.body: These are by far the most cushioned slides I’ve ever worn!

reviews.title: Easy, lightweight sandal for any use
reviews.body: Really solid slide sandal for probably any use you can think of! Sleek, classic design for wearing around town, water-proof non-slip surface for pool/beach life, and lightweight for taking on trips. I'm big into backpacking and am going to use these as camp shoes. They are light weight, have good support for after a long day hiking, and are non-slip for rough terrain. Honestly can't go wrong with these!

reviews.title: The Perfect Slide!
reviews.body: My husband absolutely loved these Nike Slides. He loved the soft, squishy contoured bottom of the slide. While wearing the slides, they continued to contoured and almost molded to his feet making them even more comfortable with each wear. He also loved how the arch support of the slide was supportive and comfortable. One thing that he mentioned right away was how the tops of the slides really held onto his food without hurting his foot. He has had some other slides that the top part was either too lose so the slide moved around or it’s too tight hurting the tops of his feet. These were made for Goldilocks, they were just right. He said that the tops were absolutely perfect. He did walk around the block a handful of times with our kids and said they were very durable. He didn’t feel like the slide was going to crack or come apart. He didn’t even slide around while walking outside on some of the ice that accumulated on the sidewalk. He had absolutely nothing negative to say about these slides. He’s in love. I will absolutely buy a pair of these slides for him and I would highly recommend anyone looking for a new summer slide.

reviews.title: No Gimmick Comfort
reviews.body: Just like other Nike shoes such as the hyperdunk or vapormax flyknit, these fit at those same sizes. It has a breathable snug and comfort fit. I was shocked at the shock absorption of these shoes. Comparing these to my other sandals, these were the priciest (by a few dollars) but most comfortable pair of sandals I've ever worn, even compared to other name brands. My wife stole these from me and even agreed after giving the "huh!" expression. I also gave that expression too as I was not expecting this level of sophistication. It's lightweight yet feels strong, has a soft foam that grips well. I have worn these all day. I tried them with and without socks to test the grip and comfort and it handles well in various occasions - including running sideways with my 2 year old toddler. These have now become my primary go-to sandal!

reviews.title: Convenient slides
reviews.body: These slide ons are great for around the house, easy slide on, look good with the camp coloring.  They are a bit narrow in fit, but to be fair, I normally buy boots in a wide width, and these were not.  They may stretch out a bit to be more comfortable, but have not had them long enough to find out. Top strap is padded and comfortable on top of the feet. The cushioning is nice,  but not personally a fan of the arch support.  They float, which is great for the pool/lake/river, Seem very durable so far.

reviews.title: Comfortable and functional
reviews.body: This slide is comfortable and well-designed.  The material is solid enough to keep the sandal on your foot but soft enough to be comfortable. I don’t necessarily like sandals with Velcro closures so I’m happy this one got my feet snugly.  I would be happy to wear them around all day. The print on the slide is unique but still matches almost all of my outfits.

title: Nike Mercurial Vapor 14 Pro TF
description: Unleash your speed in the Nike Mercurial Vapor 14 Pro TF.The refined design uses as few materials as possible to help keep you fast from start to finish.

reviews.title: First time trying Mercurial, I love it
reviews.body: I was Tiempo fan for the last 2 years, but the current tiempo was less than my previous Tiempo Genio II and caused me blisters after wearing it for 1 hour, I tried the Mercurial after returning the tiempo and I like it so far, it is comfortable and good for my wide feet.

title: Nike Defy All Day
description: Take on everyday challenges in the Nike Defy All Day. Leather up top and rubber traction on the bottom create a durable design that lasts the rigours of tough training sessions. Soft cushioning carries comfort through your workout—or a day of getting things done.

reviews.body: These shoes are for my son who is 11 years old and very active. He ruins shoes quite easily, even those that seem durable upon purchase. We have noticed that Nikes Air Max and this particular model - the Defy All Day Men's Training have been the most long lasting.

title: Nike Zoom Fly 4
description: Train hard and find your rhythm on the road.From the moment you lace up, the webbing on the upper and lacing system wrap around your foot for a secure feel from start to finish.The added flex feels highly responsive and secure with every step.A soft, breathable upper is combined with a stretchy collar for a sock-like fit for a secure, stable sensation.You've got goals to hit, lace up and fly towards a new best.

reviews.title: Best pair of shoes out of the box I’ve owned.
reviews.body: Best pair of shoes out of the box I’ve owned.   Had the zoom fly 2 and liked them as well.   Wider tow box than other Nikes I’ve tried lately.  Great supper combined w/ cushion.

title: Nike Mercurial Superfly 8 Elite AG
description: The Nike Mercurial Superfly 8 Elite AG features a new look with specialised components to let you play your fastest from start to finish. A stretchy collar provides extra support, and the innovative plate provides instant responsiveness for quicker cuts at high speeds.

title: Nike Tiempo Legend 9 Pro AG-Pro
description: 1 of our lightest Tiempos to date, the Nike Tiempo Legend 9 Pro AG-Pro lets you go on the offensive with a low-profile design that's reinvented for attackers.The upper has raised textures backed by soft foam pods for precise dribbling, passing and shooting, while studs on the bottom provide traction for quick cuts and sudden stops.

title: Nike Air Force 1 Crater
description: We remixed a classic with at least 20% recycled material by weight, making the Air Force 1 Crater a sneaker for the modern era.The translucent toe reveals a vibrant blend of materials beneath for a bold, 1-of-a-kind look.Nike Grind rubber on the outsole keeps the iconic star pattern on the tip, while the unique speckle of the Crater Foam midsole brings the OG into the future.

It allows the tongue of the shoe to move even further off cnetre which is a bit annoying, but not enough to be a deal breaker and ruin the whole new experience of the spring from the carbon fibre insert!

reviews.title: Excellent - Helps with my joint pain!
reviews.body: These shoes are incredible!! I purchased these to help manage my painful foot diagnosis, Hallux Limitus, caused by 15+ years of playing competitive tennis, which has destroyed my big toe joints. The carbon fiber technology in these shoes provide the protection my toe joints need allow me to still run and walk long distances. These shoes are superior to all all the Hoka’s I’ve purchased in the past. Very h

They are everything you read them to be - sure, they are pricey, but... that price is reflected on the elite demographic the shoes are built for. If you are racing honestly, don't think twice. Buy a pair, and save them for the events. You will fly.

reviews.title: A different shoe to the Vaporfly
reviews.body: Love these shoes. For me personally I find them a different shoe in the feel and wear in comparison to the original Vaporfly.  They feel stronger for the ankle, I find with the Vaporfly my ankle sometimes felt a little under supported, these have fixed that, the toe box size is great and I really like the upper. Strangely I don't find them as fast as the original Vaporfly.
Most comfortable pair of running shoes Nike has ever made.

reviews.title: Awesome shoe

reviews.title: Lockdown not so much...
reviews.body: I got these today and took them out for a 5k run straight out of the box. Aqua color is great, same responsiveness as Next% 1. My only con is locked down. I experienced a lot of heel slippage even though I bought my same size as in Next% 1. It must be the new flexible upper or perhaps because the front-foot seems wider. Pretty certain this is what is causing the slippage. Some like the new upper, some don't. I personally don't. It's a shame as I was looking forward to these. I am lucky to have 2 pairs of Next% 1. Valerian Blue and the Pink Blast. Will always be a Nike fan.

reviews.title: solid shoe
reviews.body: Switched to Nike in 2018, 2 pairs of Zoom Fly SPs ( size 9)  and 4 pairs of  Pegasus Turbo 2 (size 8) later,  took this shoe in size 8.5 today , shaved off my Turbo 2 record by more than 20 seconds per mile on a 5 mile run. This shoe is also the most comfortable. Mid foot striker.

reviews.title: Believe the hype
reviews.body: True to size, comfy from the off and very lightweight. I've run in them for 2 weeks now and the difference they create is outrageous, even better than I expected. My previous shoes are the Pegasus Turbo 2 which are superb, but the Next % 2 honestly blows them out the water.

title: Nike Air Force 1 NDESTRUKT
description: Put it through the ringer and still show up looking good. The Nike Air Force 1 NDESTRUKT re-imagines the b-ball icon with a tough, street-ready touch. Forged with TecTuff™ and durable rubber accents on the toe, heel and sides, it mixes action-sport style with everyday function.

title: Nike MC Trainer
description: The Nike MC Trainer helps you transition from heavy lifting in the weight room to agility drills on the turf without skipping a beat. It packs stability, durability and flexibility into a versatile design that supports all the ways you move while you train for your sport.

reviews.title: Kind of comfy, not for the gym
reviews.body: While the shoes are somewhat comfortable (6/10), they’re extremely slippery on laminate floor, as there is no grip. Tried sending back but not a good enough reason. Don’t bother.

reviews.title: great for it's price
reviews.body: Got this as a workout shoes, so far no issues at all

reviews.title: Comfortable and Stylish
reviews.body: I was pleasantly surprised by how comfortable these MC Trainers were upon immediate use. I have wide feet and it usually takes me time to "break in" new sneakers, but these felt supportive and molded nicely to my feet from the very first wear. The padding that surrounds the heel was much thicker than most of my other sneakers which took a bit getting used to (and I wasn't sure if I liked it at first), but after a while, I found that I did indeed enjoy and appreciate the extra padding and support. I took the sneakers on a few runs and found them to be supportive, lightweight, and breathable in the Arizona heat (a necessity!). The styling of the shoe itself is sharp, clean, and I really like the contrast of the black detailing against the grey sneaker. Overall, I am very happy with these sneakers and consistently find myself reaching for them over my other pairs.

reviews.title: Comfortable, light weight and stable
reviews.body: I find the Nike MC Trainer to be a comfortable shoe to casually wear throughout the day or do some light workouts.

reviews.title: Great overall shoe
reviews.body: I received the Nike MC Trainer shoes in size 8. I loved the look of them the second I open the box and was so excited to wear them. Since they were a little big on me, I had my husband wear them too and they were a good fit for him. Together, we were able to discuss our thoughts on these shoes.

reviews.title: Secure and comfortable fit
reviews.body: I got these shoes for my husband. He loves how comfortable they are. He said they were great for his HIIT classes due to secure fit and durable quality. The only slight drawback is if you prefer lighter shoes these run a bit heavy. But the comfortable secure fit is worth the trade off in his opinion.

reviews.title: Cloudlike sole on a solid shoe
reviews.body: First, I love the look - it's simple but the gray upper with black details pops against the white sole. And that sole is marshmallowy and so comfortable. These are definitely shoes I could wear all day, chasing the kids around, working out, everything.

reviews.title: Breathable and Super comfortable!
reviews.body: Nike wasn't my first choice for everyday casual shoes, but these really impressed me. They're super comfortable for wearing all day, and the breathable top really helps preventing your feet from getting too warm or tired. They look great too - I wear them playing games in the park and doing errands and they were a real treat. They wouldn't be my go-to running shoes, as I prefer something a little lighter and more flexible for running, but for just about anything else they're perfect.

reviews.title: A little above average
reviews.body: The fit and feel of this pair of shoe was okay. I do have wider feet, but it fit well. A little snug, but not too tight and not too loose. It is light weight which I do like alot. The design of the shoes is mediocre. I wasn't wowed by it like I needed to have this pair of shoe. I've worn the shoes to the gym to work out and on my runs and so far it's been ok. Not the best running shoes, but it is okay for weight lifting. What I like most about the shoes is that it's lightweight and breathable. If I could make changes to the shoes, make it a little wider, have a better color scheme, and add more cushion to it. Overall the shoes are a little above average.

reviews.title: Lightweight Gym Shoe
reviews.body: I really like the design of this shoe. It looks great on and is very lightweight. It fits a little on the small side, and has little to no arch support, so I don’t know how comfortable it would be to wear all day, but it is great for the gym. The tongue of the shoe is really soft and doesn’t scrape my ankle, which I love. This is a great, stylish option for someone who doesn’t need a lot of arch support. Just size up a little.

reviews.title: Great shoe for narrow, but not wide feet.
reviews.body: I got the Nike MC Trainer shoes in size 13. My feet are a bit wide so the shoes felt a little snug on the top. It really would have been perfect if my feet were a little narrower, not so much with wide feet. So they were comfortable, but a little too tight. Like I would be happy to wear them to work but would want to change into a more comfy shoe later. I really should have gotten them in W had it been available. However, the Nike MC Trainer offers a great deal of support. They had really great foot cushioning that was firm but not hard. The ankles were cushy but also well supported especially since there was an added durable layer surrounding the back of the ankle. The material was very breathable and although the shoes aren't the lightest, they still felt quite light.

reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish, and practical
reviews.body: The Nike MC trainer are simple, but stylish sneakers. They run fairly true to size from our experience. They do take a little bit to break them in, but once that’s done, they’re & pretty comfortable to wear all day long. The fact they they are light weight & ventilated makes them perfect for the Florida heat. The design of the shoe is just enough to give it a touch of style without being over the top, which my husband is not a fan of. They’re great for switching activities from riding bikes & playing football one minute, to running to the grocery store the next. Overall, they’re a good supportive & stylish shoe at a reasonable price point. Would recommend them out based on our positive experience with them.

reviews.title: Great Shoe Overall
reviews.body: The Nike MC Trainer is great in the gym and holds its own out on the road. The initial fit for me was good though my feet are on the wide side so these were a little extra snug until they broke in a bit. They also fit lower on my ankle than some of my other shoes. Which on first impression seemed odd but I found it to be more comfortable when wearing these for my daily workouts. The sole is very comfortable with a good grounded feel without too much extra cushion. The uppers provide great ventilation which is also a very nice feature in a trainer. As for the looks, I felt the design was straightforward and sleek without being overstated. I could and would wear this shoe all day though I usually have to change out my footwear as work and weather dictate. If there is one thing I would change it might be widening the footbed out and bringing it up a little higher especially in the heel but that is merely my preference. Overall I find the Nike MC Trainer to be a solid shoe that gives me what I need in the gym and keeps my feet cool and dry.

reviews.title: Excellent shoe with great support, best for indoors and dry weather
reviews.body: I'm reviewing these shoes on behalf of my husband, who has really enjoyed them so far. We just had a baby and these shoes have been really helpful as he bounds around the house. He said they immediately fit perfectly and are very comfortable and supportive. However, he reports that the soles aren't as grippy as he'd like on some of the slippery, hilly sidewalks we have here in Seattle. So these shoes are probably best for the gym or other indoor usage, or for dry ground.

reviews.title: Average Shoe
reviews.body: Overall, this shoe was comfortable.  The arch area was more snug than I'm used to.  As well, the heel was a little bit stiff.  Even with these issues, they were comfortable enough to wear all day long.  The design is simple and sleek.  It's a good design to dress up or down.  This was my favorite part about the shoe.  The one thing I'd change is the rigidity of the heel.  I look forward to wearing these shoes more and getting used to a new feel.

reviews.title: Good shoes. Would select again.
reviews.body: For as large and bulky the shoe appears, I found that the shoes were light on the feet. I also really appreciate that the laces are a length that I can tie a good knot, but not too long. The shoes also breathe pretty well. I like the style and feel comfortable wearing these around the office on Fridays.

reviews.title: Great look, feel, and performance
reviews.body: As someone who has trouble finding a shoe with just the right fit, I am happy to have found these.  These shoes are comfortable enough to wear all day and that fact, combined with the sleek design, means I can wear them to work, to play with my kids, and to workout.  They are very lightweight and breathable, which are my two biggest pros.  They also come in several colors so I would be happy to have more than one pair.  I do have a few minor cons/things I would change.  Firstly, while I am able to wear them all day, I would have liked the option to choose a wide size as they get more narrow towards the toe.  This may resolve itself as I break the shoe in more, but typically I would choose wide.  Secondly, the material of the side of the shoe, not the fabric, but the white portion is easily creased/damaged and after one day of wearing them was noticeable.  I suspect that they may not hold up well over time and will be increasingly difficult to keep clean.  Lastly, the laces tie a bit higher and put pressure on the ankle where I am not used to; this is not a deal breaker, but it would be great if there was another lace hole between the top two.   Overall, I am generally happy with them and will continue wearing them for as long as they last.

reviews.title: Sturdy Shoe
reviews.body: When I opened the shoe box and first saw this shoe, I loved the look and the design. The color gray is versatile and can go with any number of gym clothes that I have. When I first tried on the shoe, I noticed that the back heel flares out at an angle, and it makes it awkward when putting on and taking off. Once on, the angle of the heel is not an issue, nor does it causes pain.

reviews.title: Great shoes for short periods.
reviews.body: I really wanted to like these shoes but they just weren’t right for me. After unboxing I was impressed by the feel and quality of the shoes. They are extremely lightweight and fit true to size. After putting them on I really liked how supportive and secure they felt after lacing them up.

reviews.title: Durable shoes for working out!
reviews.body: At first look at the Nike MC trainer, I thought “what a good looking shoe”, modern but sleek and simple at the same time. I loved the gray and black how it was designed. I got a size 10 and it fit perfectly, you have to kind of  break it in because at first fit it seemed a little tight and when you start walking the heel seemed to be more higher than my heel. The more you walk on it you get used to it.  The shoe is well-made and sturdy. Your feet feel secure in it! One of my favorite features is the look of the shoe and design.  The only thing I would change is the heel seemed to be higher than other Nikes I’ve owned so it felt a little weird. I could still wear these all day no problem. Overall I think it’s a great shoe and would recommend getting it!

I really like the grey, black and white colors on this shoe. It allows you to wear it with just about anything. I’ve worn them working out as well as with jeans for a more casual outing. There’s good arch support and they are breathable. You can walk on all kinds of terrain and the soles of the shoes protect your feet. There’s nothing worse than having soft soles and being able to feel rocks while walking. I really liked the narrow look of the shoe, but when the shoes were on, they certainly didn’t feel narrow or uncomfortable. The only thing I would change would be the laces. The placement of the top shoe string holes are a little too high up for me but there’s not another option to move it down. It can be done but it’s too loose. Overall, I would definitely recommend giving these shoes a try. For the price, they are 100% worth it.

reviews.title: Comfortable but size down by a half size
reviews.body: I recently got these shoes for my husband. They run big, we would’ve been better off with a 10.5 instead of his usual 11. As far as design goes, the shoes are nice looking but my husband says they kind of look/feel like “dad shoes” and I don’t think he’s wrong there. We went with the grey and I feel like there’s definitely something about the grey specifically that comes off as a dad shoe. He is, in fact, a dad though- so it works for us. The shoe is definitely comfortable and he likes how multipurpose they feel- being able to use them on the treadmill but also wearing them to the store. I would’ve given them 5 stars if the fit was a bit better and the design a little younger.

reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
reviews.body: These Nike MC Trainers are a dream!

reviews.title: Solid Sneakers
reviews.body: The shoes fit true to size and seem sturdy.  So far they have held up well to chasing and playing with two young kids, and they seem comfortable enough to wear for a long time.

reviews.title: Functional Trainer, nice casual look
reviews.body: The MC Trainer by Nike is a middle of the road trainer style, with a nice casual profile.  It provides nice support, but felt like it ran about 1/2 size smaller in the toe length, compared to other Nikes in my closet.  It is a bit more rigid than some of the other styles I have been wearing recently, as compared to a Free style for example.  The sole is firm, which I found to be a negative when pulling them out of the box, however once I had them on they provided great support.

description: Inspired by the Nike Air Max 90, the Nike Air Max Excee is a celebration of a classic through a new lens. Elongated lines and distorted proportions on the upper bring the '90s look you love into a new, modern space.

reviews.title: Great shoes!
reviews.body: My favorite thing about these shoes is that they feel like I am walking on a cloud!  They manage to strike the perfect combination of being both super supportive and also light and airy.  Perfect for playing basketball and also for all-day comfort.  All that and they look really cool too!  They do run a tad narrow, but that isn't a problem for me as I have a relatively narrow foot.  Very happy with these shoes!

reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE!!!
reviews.body: I LOVE MY NEW SNEAKERS!!!

reviews.title: Great shoe!
reviews.body: Really liked this shoe. It is excellently comfortable, great for working in, enjoying a day with my family or even just being outside. It looks great with my clothes. I got the gray but I know there are several other color ways and options. Wouldn’t recommend if you have a particularly wide foot but otherwise definitely give these a try.

reviews.title: Nice Design
reviews.body: I like the design of these shoes, sadly that’s about it. I tried to wear them a couple of times but they just didn’t fit my feet very well.

reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
reviews.body: I work on my feet all day and am always on the hunt for a comfortable shoe. When I received these shoes I was initially excited by the style of them, they look great and will really go with any type of outfit. I tried them on and they were a bit snug at first, but have stretched out a tad to be more comfortable. I would say they run a bit on the narrow side though. Overall I can wear them day in and day out and not feel the normal achy feeling in my feet I normally would get after a long day of work, so I'm happy. I'm glad I was able to find a stylish shoe that also is comfortable and I know will last me a long time since Nike is a great brand!

reviews.title: Comfortable shoes but not my style - too much like a dad's BBQ shoe
reviews.body: I was really excited to receive these shoes and they looked really sweet in the box. Nike took great care in their box presentation and the quality of shoe felt awesome pulling it out. Unfortunately for me, that's where my taste for the shoe stopped. The shoes look nice and the Air Max red highlight against the grey is a nice touch but they weren't quite my style. Putting them on reminded me of the those shoes you see a good cook BBQ dad or uncle wear, but I thought maybe it was just a matter of my initial taste so I laced the bad boys up and wore them out on a quick out of town trip. Usually I get compliments on my shoes and this was not one of those times. I take pride that my shoes usually make a statement and attract other sneaker heads or at least get the random "sweet shoes" comment. These did not as they kind of just blended in as a normal casual shoe. So the appearance design was a bust for me, but I really have to brag about the comfort of the shoe. If it weren't for the way these specific shoes looked (nice looking shoe but again not my taste), I would wear these shoes ALL DAY! These were some of the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. We ran, walked for miles, got on a couple of trails and these shoes held up and were soooo comfortable. That for me was honestly these shoes' saving grace! The fit was specific to size and the materials weren't heavy and breathe really well. I'll be excited to see if Nike comes out with other color options and would definitely give those a try!

reviews.title: A lot of support but not a lot of comfort
reviews.body: The first thing I noticed with these shoes is that they definitely run a bit small.  I normally wear an 11.5-12 depending on the shoe and tried these in 12's and they were very tight.  I could tell they offered a good amount of support but the small fit combined with a noticeable lack of cushioning made these difficult to stand in and wear for long periods of time.

reviews.title: Comfort and Stylish in One!
reviews.body: Gotta say, I was pretty impressed with the comfort level with this shoe. As a mom of a toddler, this was my go-to shoe whenever we headed out (for essentials!) and ran errands or just a quick playtime at the park. If you’re a parent, you already know how tiring and exhausting it is to chase after a toddler but this shoe kept me going the full day and my feet weren’t sore at the end of the night! It provided me with enough support, but also super comfortable, for me to run around in. Not heavy and definitely wasn’t anything that made my feet super hot or sweaty either. It’s nicely designed so it’s not like I’m wearing a mom/dad shoe, but provides the support I need. Definitely would suggest to factor in if you have wide feet or if you wear thick socks. When you factor those in, these run true to size. The absolute best part is that they don’t look huge on my feet either! They go well with everything. Love them!

reviews.title: Men’s Nike Air Excee
reviews.body: So far this has been a great all around day to day shoe, and has left me feeling comfortable all day long!  I think it’s the the air max portion of the shoe that has you feel like you’re walking on a cloud all day mixed with the nice thick and cushy insoles. I’m about 6 ft tall and around 225lb and work out a lot, so I can honestly say you shouldn’t have a problem with comfort or durability for anyone around a similar size or smaller . (don’t see why it wouldn’t also be the same for bigger guys as well.) I love the design of these and the color I have is white so they go with anything I decide to wear, whether it’s with shorts to the gym or jeans to meet up with friends at dinner. I personally love the crisp clean white color, but I know how hard white shoes can be to keep clean at times, I sprayed them with a protector and that’s helped a lot. Also there’s a lot of other color combos they have in this shoe if white is not your color. So overall I would definitely recommend the Nike Men’s Air Max Excee for all around look , comfort, and durability, especially if you’re on your feet a lot like I am and an active person these will be a great fit for you.

reviews.title: Great shoes comfort is awesome
reviews.body: Great shoes comfort and always reliable!Nike is the best been buying shoes for over 35 years and there still #1

reviews.title: Very nice shoe, but ...
reviews.body: Nice shoe, very snug, good toe box.  It needs one more lace hole, and much more ankle support for tennis.

reviews.title: Almost Perfect
reviews.body: I really enjoyed the shoes, my only gripe would be at the ankle point they are slightly snug and you can't wear really low cut socks as they rub my ankle a bit if my sock was too low making it uncomfortable. With the correct sock however I felt very supported and very comfortable walking around in them, I tried taking them for a run but I prefer a running shoe for that. I can't wait to use them on my family's trip to Disney World whenever it is safe to go because they are really comfortable for walking.

reviews.title: Fresh Pair of Kicks!
reviews.body: Just like any shoe on the market, these will take a little bit of time to break in. Once I broke these in, they fit and feel fantastic. The mesh on the shoes allow your feet to breathe and increase performance. I would say that these shoes run a bit on the narrow side, so try them on first to make sure they fit your feet appropriately. These are my first pair of Nike Air Max's and I love the style of them as they will go perfect with shorts or a pair of jeans. These shoes were comfortable enough to wear all day long; I would definitely recommend these to anyone that is looking for a stylish casual pair of shoes. My favorite feature of this shoe is the red air bubble in the heel area; I like how it looks and the color scheme is perfect.

reviews.title: All around solid shoe
reviews.body: Straight out of the box these shoes impressed. They've got a great colorway, and a classic look (you have to love the bubble). I termed them the modern dad shoe. The comfort of these shoes delivered, as expected. These guys know how to make a shoe you can wear all day long. Whether going for a run or running to the store. The only complaint I have on sizing is the toe box was a little narrow from what I have experienced in the past with Nike's. I like a little more room at the ball of my foot than was offered. They may stretch out to accommodate my foot over time (though I am a standard width) but time will tell. All around these are a really solid shoe and will be wearing them everywhere.

title: Giannis Immortality
description: The future of basketball is positionless, and nobody embodies this evolution like MVP Giannis Antetokounmpo.The Giannis Immortality is a game shoe for players who love Giannis's multi-dimensional game and want a piece of his freaky style.

reviews.title: Its ok?
reviews.body: The shoe was very disappointing. It has been only about a month with the shoe and already the nike

reviews.title: All-around awesome
reviews.body: I got these shoes for my fiancé to try out. He’s not a sneaker head by any means, but he definitely appreciates a nice shoe and tends to follow trends fairly closely. I, on the other hand, like shoes that are practical and are more “timeless” and not so trendy. These shoes managed to satisfy both of us! I feel confident that these shoes will last him a while and are a style I actually like

reviews.title: Shoes/Shipping
reviews.body: Love the colors of the shoe and they fit perfectly.  The shipping was excellent.  Ordered on Monday and had them Thursday.

reviews.title: Giannis Immortality Shoe
reviews.body: This shoe is very comfortable, has a nice look and was a great pick for the team's shoe!!!

reviews.title: Excellent shoes
reviews.body: These are some comfortable shoes.  I like wearing my shoes a little bit tight so by the end of the day the tops of my feet might hurt. Not with these shoes.  All day comfort. They're light weight and have excellent support. These have become my new favorite shoe.

reviews.title: They get the job done
reviews.body: These shoes look really nice. I really enjoy the differing patterns on the check marks. One side is black and white pattern that shifts slightly depending on the way you look at it while the other has a nice green pattern that reminds me of the sole of some other NIke shoes I have seen. They are sleek and comfortable and I feel like I can wear them with most everyday outf

reviews.title: Comfortable, Stylish, Love!
reviews.body: These sneakers are as awesome as the athlete who created them. The style is off the charts: sleek, exciting and ready to wear with anything. Specifically used for exercising at home, these sneakers move and flex with you and  support in all areas. Can't wait to expand my exercise routines with these super sneakers.

reviews.title: Excellent Shoes!
reviews.body: First of all - this is a GREAT-looking shoe!! I got the Black/White/Wolf Grey/Clear colorway and I love the pop of color on the swoosh. The style just screams the Greek Freak so if you are a fan of Giannis, you would definitely love this shoe.Just some important things

reviews.title: Good Basketball Shoes but Too Young Looking for Me
reviews.body: The Nike Giannis Immortality shoes are a nice basketball shoe. They fit well and are very comfortable. I wore them for about an hour playing basketball and felt like I had good support throughout. I wanted to love these shoes, since they’re so comfortable but they’re just not my style. I feel like they work better for a teenager/someone in their early 20s. For refer

reviews.title: Cool Sporty Shoe
reviews.body: I got these shoes for my husband. They are a cool looking shoe with lots of three dimensional details that feel really luxurious. The heel feels really cushioned. The black and white color combination is classic with a little pop of yellow in the logo. The shoelaces are really complementary with a black and white pattern too. These would look nice as a fashion shoe to wear out but also functional for sport. They have a m

reviews.title: Good shoe after breaking in. Runs narrow.
reviews.body: Overall fairly happy with this shoe. My only complaint is they do run fairly narrow. My husband has an average width foot in every shoe he has ever worn and said that it felt like his pinky toe was hanging off of the toe box. They also fit very snug through the mid foot area so I would size up if you don’t like tight fitting shoes. The overall appearance of the shoes is sleek and athletic looking and they are less bulky than a traditional basketball shoe. They provide good ankle support while being fairly low profile. My husband said he would’ve preferred a little more mobility and flexibility through the rest of the shoe though. When he first started wearing them, they were pretty hard and didn’t feel like they had much cushioning, but as they got broken in they became much more comfortable, and my husband said he could see wearing them all day once they relaxed some. The best part of these shoes is the good, solid ankle support in them. I would change the width to make them a little bit wider in the toe box. I recommend trying them on to see if you like the snug performance fit.

reviews.title: Shock Absorbent
reviews.body: This is my first new pair of athletic shoes in a while and I am shocked at how the technology and comfort has progressed. My first reaction when seeing them was, these shoes look legit but then I put them on and they also felt like wearing clouds so they look good and feel good.

reviews.title: Wanted to love it
reviews.body: The shoes are very colorful and aesthetically pleasing. They have a classic Nike feel and a ton of cushioning. I like the unique laces, solid colors, with subtle hints of brightness.  I dont understand the oversized heel but I'm sure its useful on the basketball court somehow.   Unfortunately, the shoes are just too narrow for my wide feet. They are very painful to wear, but I hope they will break-in so i can wear them more often.

reviews.title: Great looking!
reviews.body: I got these shoes for my husband, and he absolutely LOVES them! They look so good on him; the design is really attractive. He likes the fit. He really enjoys shoes that are tight around the arch and give good support and the Giannis Immortality Basketball Shoes totally do that! They fit perfectly true to size.

reviews.title: Excellent shoe
reviews.body: I'm a big fan of these shoes. They are light and feel like they minimize impact on my knees, which tend to hurt after an intense workout. I have flat feet and found that these have a great amount of support for my arches. I gave these shoes a 4 star rating over a 5 star rating because these shoes get narrow towards the toes so they were a little tight.

reviews.title: Good heel support
reviews.body: I love the style especially the checkered swoosh on the inside of the shoe which makes it stand out . The shoes design is definitely fresh and I received many compliments about the design. I loved the heel support that makes them comfortable but not really for all day wear. They are very narrow which is why I didn't find them too comfortable for all day wear. Great traction when playing ball but not much ankle support . The color was perfect to go with any color I wear . Definitely recommend for those looking for a new stylish shoe.

reviews.title: Love them.
reviews.body: I bought these for the intentions of using them for all the sports I do, not just basketball. And currently I’m using them for volleyball and they work wonderfully! They are more than just a basketball shoe…

reviews.title: Great Basketball Shoes
reviews.body: The fit and feel of these basketball shoes are pretty good. They are extremely comfortable and I have been wearing them for long periods of time without them hurting. I have wide feet so the front is a little snug but since the material is stretchy, it isn't giving me any real problems. In terms of the material, I like how it feels as it's soft. The thing I like most about the shoes is the design as I feel it's edgy but at the same time has a simplicity about it. One thing I would change is just how bulky the sole is at the back of the shoe. Overall, these are great!

reviews.title: Great shoe on and off the court!
reviews.body: First impression of the Giannis Immortality Shoes was wow! These are a sleek looking shoe, something you can wear on and off the court and look good no matter what. The shoe fits true to size and they’re extremely comfortable. I was able to get a couple of pickup games in before writing this review and they treated me well. I love the design of this shoe I have the black and white ones and they get nothing but complements. These shoes are most definitely comfortable enough to wear all day long and through multiple games. My favorite part of this shoe would have to be just how good they look! I don’t know if there is much I would change about them.

reviews.title: Comfortable, Sturdy Shoe
reviews.body: This shoe is really interesting - I liked the design a lot - the different design for the swoosh on either side was something I was into. Also, a small detail, but I also liked the laces a lot, and the branding with the 'A' is rad. The shoe does what a lot of Nike shoes do, at least in my experience, which is runs a little small...I could've use a half-size bigger for it to be more comfortable. It was too tight to comfortable wear no-show socks, so I went without...which actually turns out is ok because the inside is moisture wicking and felt like a sock, surprisingly comfortable! I also felt like I had great support in this shoe, even as a low-top, which is impressive. While I didn't wear this all day long because it was just a little too small, it was comfortable enough to run, and to run errands with my kids, too.

reviews.title: Rad shoes!
reviews.body: These not only look pretty rad, but they are super comfortable as well. They look modern, but not too trendy. I am a 35 year old dad after all. They seem pretty durable and the design is creative. I like the color scheme—eye catching, but not too “loud”. They are pretty light and I think I could wear them all day without any problems. The only thing I would change would be the toe box—maybe a little wider would be more comfortable. Overall, great show! Would def recommend.

reviews.title: Perfect for Wide Feet!
reviews.body: I was stoked when I got these shoes.  They have an excellent modern design and coloring but the best part about them is the mesh structure.  Often Nike shoes are too narrow for my wide feet or some part of the outer design presses into the side of my feet (near my pinky toe to be specific).  These don’t.  They are all a mesh like material at the front which flexes and gives lots of comfy wiggle room. And none of the design elements restrict the width either.

reviews.title: trendy basketball shoes
reviews.body: they feel great putting on. feels secure, however, i have wide feet so they do feel a little tight. may need to take more time to “break” them in.

reviews.title: Perfect Giannis fan tennis shoes.
reviews.body: Super comfy casual shoes that stay fresh and are great to wear casually.

title: Nike Air Force 1 '07 WB
description: The legend lives on in the Nike Air Force 1 '07 WB, a low-cut take on the iconic AF-1 that offers classic court style and premium cushioning.

reviews.body: Magnifique !!!!   Air Force très quali !

reviews.title: Amazing 💯💯💯
reviews.body: Great shoe I loved it.

reviews.title: Glad I got it! Gotta get all three ( Hi, Mid, Low) to wear/stomp out all year round!
reviews.body: Handsome shoe. Updated laces.  The metal lace hole is a nice tweek.
Been waiting for these a long time to come back out
I love these shoes very much, and I will be very happy to buy them.

reviews.title: The absolute coolest AF1s
reviews.body: Well what can I say?  Once these were teased on the Nike page as 'Coming Soon' I checked several times a day for like 2 weeks, hoping to get lucky and catch the drop.  And whaddya know?  One day I clicked and there they were.  This was the first time I ever got in on a drop as cool as this after being denied like 20 times during 2020.

reviews.title: Please add 9.5
reviews.body: I agree with JoeA956460740. Definitely need to add more size 9.5. I managed to get a 9 and 10 but not sure if they will even fit me.

reviews.title: Want them
reviews.body: Need to drop more size 9.5

reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase.
reviews.body: I was a little concerned when ordering due to previous reviews about siding when it comes to these shoes. Here is the deal for those who are in the same boat. I always wear a size 10.5 in a Nike air Jordan show. With this shoe a 9.5 is a perfect fit. If you like your shoes just a little loose go a half size down only and in my opinion a full size down for a perfect fit...

reviews.title: Just buy them
reviews.body: Great quality, super nice material, comfortable and durable. Definitely a good buy

title: Nike ZoomX Dragonfly
description: Light and breathable with a bounce to every step.The Nike ZoomX Dragonfly delivers the speed you need to stand out from the pack in races from 1,500 to 10,000 metres.Details throughout celebrate the power of sport rising to the challenge of the moment.

reviews.title: Dragonfly heel is sharp
reviews.body: Shoe technology wise is excellent, best spike I’ve ever had. Makes you feel fast. I have bigger feet and they fit really nice. One thing I do not like. When I run, especially when my form breaks, my left heel hits my right ankle. This isn’t usually a problem, however due to the shape of the spike it is. The foam at the very back of the spikes sole is very sharp. Aesthetically it looks really nice, but I don’t think i

title: Nike Blazer Low ’77 Vintage By You
description: The Nike Blazer Low '77 Vintage By You gets a heritage makeover with innovative corduroy material that you can cut, rip or allow to wear naturally to reveal a wavy, tapestry-like fabric underneath with a character all of its own. Open mesh, classic leather and luscious suede in 13 colours let you switch up your textures and palette. 3 different Swoosh options, including a wraparound version, let you pick your commitment to heritage vibes or 1-of-a-kind style.

title: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38
description: Your workhorse with wings got race-ready.The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 returns with the same spring-in-your-step feel, but refreshed with specific city details so you can rep Berlin with pride as you rack up your miles.The insole graphic reminds you of the present moment, while its responsive foam cushions every step.

title: Nike Phantom GT2 Club MG
description: Building off the Phantom GT, the Nike Phantom GT2 Club MG features an updated design and patterning that's engineered to help you place your shots with pinpoint accuracy.Off-centre lacing provides a clean strike zone to help you dribble, pass and score with precision.

reviews.title: Too narrow.

info.name: H O
info.location: Whitley Bay, Tyne and Wear, GB

reviews.body: Unfortunately although my 12 year old daughter really liked the look of these football boots the size 6 were too narrow for her size 5.5 feet so we will have to return them.

reviews.title: Decent for the price.
reviews.body: Cheap pair of boots but I seen why when I put them on the material isn’t the best it looked like they were caving in when I tied my laces. Reasonable comfortability after wearing them a few times.

title: Nike ACG Air Deschutz +
description: From city hikes to canyon trails and long walks on the beach, the Nike ACG Air Deschutz + is built to feel comfortable.It's got a classic '90s look and rugged outdoor-inspired design, with plush padding around the ankle for support.A heavy-duty webbing strap and adjustable hook-and-loop closure keep you focused on the journey ahead.

reviews.title: ACG is really nice!
reviews.body: My wife has a pair and she likes them so much we got a pair for her sister since she love walking.  She says they make her want to go on more walks.  She loves them!  They are perfect!!!

title: Nike x Off-White™ Air Zoom Tempo NEXT%
Nike Air Force 1
description: Fall in love again with the Nike Air Force 1, the b-ball OG that adds a little crush into every step. The crisp leather on the upper, bold red heart with a Swoosh logo by the heel and flirty red accents let you court the streets in style.

reviews.title: Satisfied
reviews.body: First time buying this shoes and im loving it and fits perfect.

title: Nike Air Tuned Max
description: Debuting just before the new millennium, the Nike Air Tuned Max brought you cutting-edge innovation, perfected performance and an ahead-of-its-time design.Now, it returns with perfected Tuned Air and eye-catching finishes.Its striking design let you know it's Alpha Project certified, comfortable and ready to move.

reviews.body: Nice looking comfortable shoe, just a little narrow, order a half size up for a comfortable fit
Like the grey colorway and fast delivery

reviews.title: Small and tight
reviews.body: Very tight in the toe box

title: Nike Venture Runner
description: Elevating OG style with a comfy insole and suede on the upper, the Nike Venture Runner nods to the iconic running shoes of the '80s.The exposed stitching, high-flex upper and a micro-branded heel clip add fresh details to the athletics-inspired look.

title: Air Jordan XXXVI SE Luka 'Global Game'
description: Quickly ascending to the top of the league, all eyes are on Luka as his MVP-calibre game will be on display with his home country for the first time since 2017.With years of international acclaim and success that he's bound to defy once again, Luka knows he's here for a reason.Inspired by all of the places Luka can take basketball, the Air Jordan XXXVI 'Global Game' celebrates the purpose and pride that comes with repping your country's colours.

title: Nike SB Bruin React T
description: Want a lightweight, flexible shoe you can ride in all day?Us, too.That's why we built the Nike SB Bruin React T. It's a durable low top with springy, responsive Nike React foam—all in a skate-right design.

reviews.title: Nike Bruin react's best shoes you'll ever buy!
reviews.body: Excellent some of the comfiest shoes you'll ever wear I own about 4 pairs of bruin reacts and they my favourite shoes for sure ' perfect width 'weight and amount of cushioning ' either to skate in or wear as a casual shoe they work in every format 10/10 from me !

reviews.title: Love these trainers!
reviews.body: Recently ordered these in the white/pink colourway and they look even better in the flesh than online - even my 12 year old son commented how cool there are!Normally I'm a UK 10.5 in Nikes so originally ordered that size, however there were a bit tight and also narrower than all my o

reviews.body: La semelle est top, réel confort.

reviews.title: Pretty, But Very Narrow!
reviews.body: I bought these to skate in.  Love the style, colors, and materials, but they are way too narrow to be comfortable. Even without the drop-in midsole, they are still too narrow to be comfortable, while somehow also being a bit long.I really wanted to like these, but they'd make my ska
I bought a pair because it looked great on Yibo Wang. And it looks great on me too. It is comfort. The shoe is wider than running shoe and feel like large than true for narrow feet.
Love them .Nikes are thebest.

reviews.title: Simply beautiful.
reviews.body: Simply beautiful, it meets my expectations

reviews.title: They run very small
reviews.body: Don’t be like me and listen to the one review saying these are bigger than true to fit. I ordered my shoes size and they were TINY. Don’t be like me! Otherwise awesome shoes I ordered more

reviews.title: i ordered the black/whit react- im so happy this was the mistake
reviews.body: im so impressed with these shoes. my friend bought the react running shoes and i tried them on- tried to figure out where they would have this kind of level of response and still be a proper skateboard shoe. Nyjah 2 somehow was even more flexible and immaculate board feel, without sacrificing feeel, rugged/toughness of the material- blows my mind and this goes on and on and on. the p

reviews.title: Runs big but very durable if you like a shoe without much grip.
reviews.body: The bad stuff first.  I've worn a 10.5 in every Nike I've bought since 9th grade and this is the first one I should have gone with a 10 on.   The other issue is that after about 1 hour of skating the shoe was slippery on the board.  It's just not grippy eno

reviews.title: Like this shoe very much
reviews.body: It is my first time to purchase Nike SB shoe. I saw a show in which the dancer Wang Yibo wore this shoes and I like the style and color immediately.

reviews.title: Nike SB Bruin React T (What a beauty)
reviews.body: Saw Wang Yibo (China) wearing this pair to a show. Fell in love and placed an order immediately. Love the colors. So fresh and summer and happy.

reviews.title: Something a bit different
reviews.body: I saw these on one of the Nike emails, and they just stood out to me. The react inner sole is pretty comfortable, but I've only worn them once. I liked the silhouette and the colour scheme of the shoes, they just seem to work quite well. I liked the black pair, so might be a future pick up, but the white colour way with the blue and pink accents really works well together.

reviews.title: Great style for the end of summer
reviews.body: These shoes are super comfortable and I love the offset swoosh on the outside. This style is fire.

reviews.title: great looking show and super confortable
reviews.body: Love this colorway. The react insole is super confortable. Great quality shoe overall.

reviews.title: Good shoe
reviews.body: Snug but very comfy,  overall solid build.

reviews.title: PERFECTION
reviews.body: Overnight shipping was successful. And the shoe was perfect. I am so happy with this purchase more than any other one ever. And I’m always happy with Nike purchase.

reviews.title: Bruins that can take a impact
reviews.body: My last few pairs bruins to skate in the insole got worn and thin feeling quick. These feel so plush compared those! They take a impact way better than the regular SB bruins. I really like them so far.

title: Air Jordan XXXV 'Centre of Gravity'

Building upon the design of the XXXIV, the debut XXXV colourway is a nod to the original Air Jordan 5 on its 30th anniversary. Helping to centre your gravity when you're on the court and defy it when you take flight, the AJXXXV 'Centre of Gravity' represents what it takes to control the game.

reviews.title: Great shoe on and off the court

reviews.title: Great shoes
reviews.body: These shoes definitely catch the eye! The bright colors are not for everyone but if you are looking to make a statement then you’ve found your shoe! They were a bit stiff initially but I found they broke in nicely and are fairly comfortable for daily wear for a variety of activities. They seem durable, but time will tell once they get some miles on them and we see how soft the sole is.

reviews.title: Winning style.
reviews.body: Big bold colors. The extra padding around the low ankle takes some time to get used to. I wish they were a little higher rise around the ankle for basketball shoes. Weight of the shoe is fair.

reviews.title: Super Stylish and Comfortable
reviews.body: Let me just start this review by saying that I am by no means a "sneaker head". I like shoes but I'm not a collector. I'm a Dad in my early 30s with 3 kids and I LOVE this sneakers! When I first opened the box the pink and blue just radiate out and they're definitely louder than anything I would normally wear but they're so stylish I immediately fell in love with them. They styling is great, the materials feel durable, and they are very comfortable.

reviews.title: Great shoes for basketball and other activities
reviews.body: These shoes are great for basketball and all sorts of other activities but do not fit me well enough to be worn daily for long periods of time.

reviews.title: Amazingly Supportive and Stylish Shoe
reviews.body: Right out of the box I was incredibly impressed with the attractive new Nike Lebron XVIII Lo. The fit was ever so slightly short, but very close to my usual size and the feel is incredible - supportive without being stiff. The Nike Lebron XVIII Lo will easily carry you through long days on and off the court as it is amazingly supportive. Although not quite my style, the color is eye-catching and vibrant. I also like that this lo has more of the styling of a mid top basketball shoe. My favorite aspect of the Nike Lebron XVIII Lo would have to be the superior ankle support. The only thing I might change would be the color options, but overall an excellent basketball shoe.

reviews.title: Love the durability
reviews.body: My husband typically wears a 10.5 so that’s the size we went with. He said they felt really tight but after a few wears they grew on him more, which is why the rating is 4 versus 5. The perfect shoe on first wear would feel great.

reviews.title: Great Arch Support, Great Design, Runs Small, Tight at the Ankle
reviews.body: When I pulled these shoes out of the box, I immediately thought "these are men's sneakers that make you look at them." I know if I saw some guys running up and  down the court, these are the sneakers I would be following. The color draws the eye. I did find the thick blue heel to be a bit much for me (although it does appear to provide more spring in my jump). They are bolder than I, as a woman with larger feet who always wants to downplay that feature, would typically go for. The black around the edge helped minimize the size issue for me though. If you are looking to make a statement with your sneakers, these fit the bill.

reviews.title: Average Shoe
reviews.body: I thought the shoe was fairly comfortable and provided good support.  My one complaint about how it felt was that it seemed a little tight width wise in the toes, but then would get more comfortable as I continued to wear. I did like the padding in the back.

reviews.title: Good support
reviews.body: These shoes have great support around the ankles with cushion to make it comfortable. They did fit a little snug, but I know shoes differ from brand to brand. The color and style are on point and everybody looks! Sure to make a statement.

reviews.title: Overall all loved the design.
reviews.body: I've gotten several compliments ☺, and I never get compliments on my shoes.  They're tight at first I'd say it takes like 2 days till worn in. Once they are though it's like I'm walking on pillows.

reviews.title: Shoe looks the part, but might not be comfortable for everyone!
reviews.body: I was excited to get these shoes, as previous shoes have been great!  These looked great, with some really bold colours and design.  I was a little put off by the height of the clear cushion area at the heel, but they looked much better once I was wearing them and could view them from above.  My bodyweight probably helped squash them down slightly too.

reviews.title: Comfort and style on the court
reviews.body: As soon as I put on the shoe, I felt the NIke React system in the forefoot immediately. It is very soft and provides a lot of protection against impact and worked well with the compression and impact resistance in the heel.

reviews.title: I Got Next
reviews.body: Once I put on the Nike Lebron XVIII Lo's I'm ready for the court. The first thing I notice is they are snug on my feet, and this is a must when I'm hooping. They're considered a lo, but they feel more like a mid. When I start running and cutting the Lebron's handle as well as I would expect from  any high end basketball shoe. I normally wear a 10 but, these run small so I would definitely size up. Another great feature especially after running 2 or 3 games, is that the thin  mesh on the sides of the shoe make them very breathable.  But by far my favorite part of the shoe (see picture) is the memory form support on the back side of your ankle. This form support cradles your ankles as your breaking ankles on the court. I would definitely recommend these shoes if your in the market for some new basketball shoes.

reviews.title: Can't miss me in my new kicks!
reviews.body: The Nike LeBron XVIII Lo is a bright shoe! It is Hot pink, Light blue and black and it is beautiful! It is definitely a shoe that grows on you. When it was first taken out of the box, the bright colors made me pause but after a while they grew on me and now I LOVE them. Also the shoe is SUPER comfortable! It does run narrow and would have gotten a half size bigger if I would have known.  But even though my pinky toes were a little uncomfortable the overall comfort of the shoe sort of made up for it. The inside of the shoe is like walking on a soft mattress and the shoe absorbs a lot of the impact. The shoe is a high back shoe and even though I usually don't like them, the shoe was comfortable and it didn't bother me at all. Because the shoe was a little narrow and my pinky toes were feeling the brunt of it, I couldn't wear it for more than a few hours but if the size was correct, this is the type of shoe that I could totally wear all day long. If I could change anything, it would be the narrowness towards the front. This would solve the size issue! Besides that, I LOVE this shoe and it's my new go to from  walking the hills around my house to taking family pictures

reviews.title: Great style, super comfortable, just runs small size wise
reviews.body: These shoes are amazing!! So much support in the ankle and arches, and there’s even a little extra cushion around the heals for more comfort and support. These have great bounce and movement, and are snug, but uncomfortably so. I would have given them 5 stars, but they actually don’t fit me right. I would have needed to size up at least a half size, maybe even a full size. I can wear them, they’re just a little too tight and my toes are squished in the end. Keep that in mind if you’re ordering. Size up at least a half size! Overall, these are amazing kicks and my wife loves them since they do fit her. She’s about a size 10 in women, and these are 11’s. Something to think about! I highly recommend, though. The colors are vibrant and so much better in person!

reviews.title: Style Meets Performance.
reviews.body: The last time I owned a pair of basketball shoes was the Nike Lebron Zoom Solider VII. I was excited to test out how much the technology and design have changed since then. I normally wear a men’s size 9 and these shoes were true to size for me. They were easy and comfortable to put on. If you have wider feet, I’d recommend getting a half to full size up.

reviews.title: Most supportive shoe I have.
reviews.body: I have never had a shoe with this much support! I could wear these shoes all day, or I could play some ball in them and not worry about being uncomfortable. It feels like they give you and extra spring in your step. I honestly think my vertical jump is better with these shoes and I feel less fatigue. They also have tremendous grip so you don’t slip and slide all over the place. They feel very durable so I should get a lot of use out of them. My favorite part of these shoes is the support and comfort I feel in them. I can’t wait to put these shoes to the test and see how long they hold up. I think they will last a long time!

title: Nike Metcon 7
description: The gold standard for weight training just keeps getting better—the Nike Metcon 7—now the toughest and most stable version yet. We've added responsive foam underfoot to up the comfort and a tab that locks down your laces, so you can forget about them coming untied when you're focused on your next PR.

reviews.title: Metcon 7 is Heaven
reviews.body: Great addition. Impressed for sure.
Very stable shoe but runs slightly smaller than all my previous metcons

reviews.title: Tellement déçu

info.name: Gogualgo
info.location: NANTES, Pays de la Loire, FR

reviews.body: Tellement content de recevoir ce nouveau modèle, quelques jours après sa sortie et pourtant il n'aura fallu attendre que 2 séances de crossfit pour les voir déjà rendre l'âme... Tellement déçu!!
I love the style, fit and they are very comfortable for strength training as well as hIIT.

reviews.title: Great Shoe but Lacks Quality
reviews.body: I absolutely love my Metcon 7's. I have the Mat Fraser Special Editions (bought them first) and they are Amazing! my favorite training shoe by far compared to the past Metcon's or Nanos.  But this particular shoe, the Member Exclusive Light Bone/Gum Medium Brown/Sail/ Multi-Color Style: DH2727-091 (I have heard it is supposed to be produced with recycled

reviews.title: Top
reviews.body: Meilleure chaussure de CrossFit jusqu'à présent niveau confort et technicité
Nike knocked it out the park with this one. Best Metcon ever. Perfect fit and super comfortable.

reviews.title: Amazing but questionable quality and wrong colour laces!
reviews.body: Amazing shoes, fit and comfort excellent, runs true to size and great for my wide feet.
If you want accidental salmon colored laces, buy the shoe

reviews.title: Nike a tué un classique ...
reviews.body: Super look super confort mais ...Beaucoup moins respirant , on sent une double épaisseur qui va forcément s'abimer voire se trouer de l'intérieur . À ce niveau là , la metcon 6 était parfaite .La semelle est très agrippante mais aussi beaucoup moins durable , le react est très proch

reviews.title: Impressed
reviews.body: Well designed for the intended purpose. The aesthetics and use of recycled materials are very progressive.

title: Nike Waffle One
description: Bringing a new look to the iconic Waffle franchise, the Nike Waffle One balances everything you love about heritage Nike running with fresh innovations.Its plastic heel clip adds energy and a mixture of transparent mesh and luscious suedes give it a modern edge.The springy midsole features the classic wedge shape, while the updated Waffle outsole provides a level of support and traction you have to feel to believe.

title: Zion 1
description: With a down-to-earth persona and abilities that are out of this world, Zion is unlike anybody else.On court, the gentle spirit who's all about family transforms into an unmatched force of unstoppable athleticism and speed.The Zion 1 kicks off his signature line with a design inspired by his duality of humility and superhuman ability.Full-length Air Strobel cushioning is stacked with a Zoom Air unit in the forefoot—a sensational mix of plush underfoot comfort and rapid responsiveness.It's light, stable and strong, with aggressive traction to help Zion grip the court and control his power.
